39450930.review:
Una visual novel que mezcla la fantasia de un mundo medieval dominado por la magia, con ciencia ficcion con tecnologia contemporanea, es lo que describiria esta novela. Vamos a aclarar algo, este juego NO es un hentai y no tienes escenas candetes, asi que si lo que busca son novelas con dichas caracteristicas, esta visual novel no es para ti, sin mas el analisis.

Puntos Positivos: un gran punto de esta novela, es que esta disponible en español de manera OFICIAL, osea no necesitas parche para traducir el juego, ya que viene traducido oficialmente. buena historia, que mezcla dos elementos incompatibles que son la fantasia y la ciencia ficcion. Personajes extrañables que desde el primer momento te simpayizan. una trama muy triste, oscura y algo perturbadora, pues aunque se desvia de la historia principal nos cuenta una historia sobre una familia que ha sufrido mucho y que llega a derramar lagrimas.

Puntos Negativos: solo hay dos cosas que no me gustaron de esta novela. La primera es que no venga con voces, por el cual la invercion es muy lenta y pesada para el jugador, creo que si estuviera doblaje de voz, seria mas entretenido. Lo segundo seria el dibujo, pues siento que esta clase de dibujo no me gusta demaciado, no tiene ese estilo de anime que se usa hoy en dia, no es punto negativo en si, pero en mi opinion no me gusta esa clase de dibujo, nada mas.

Esta visual novel le doy un 7/10, lo recomiendo para quienes ya se aburran de jugar visual novels hentais y quieran algo mas normal. Claro que esta para decirlo que esto lo recomiendo para la gente que le gusta el anime o que le gusta jugar visual novels, no es para todo publico.

39387993.review:
对女主角占绝对分量的故事和游戏没有抵抗力，即使这是一个仿佛很常规的“公主归国复仇”的故事。
而常规的童话故事主线的惊艳之处在于，公主并不是单纯意义上的处处受保护的所谓“白莲花”女主，这一部末的画风陡然突变实在是让人欣喜——“孤只道一回，好生细细听取”。其实仔细想来，本篇剧情中很多地方其实埋有各角色人格的伏笔，这也和大背景设定的“灵继”紧密契合。
不管是公主、女侍卫ritona，或是反派的梅拉诺大人，还是本篇支线故事的核心露恩，人设画风都很棒，[strike] 最重要的都是鲜活个性的妹子	[/strike]。看得出想要构思设定的“外域”“内域”“魔力”“科学”等字眼形成的大世界观下，故事的主线还很长。[spoiler] 希望后续不要烂尾了[/spoiler]作为开篇作，这次也只是讲了一个归途开始时支线故事而已——得益于多种方式转换的叙事手法和对多个人设丰富的刻画，却是一个颇有些感动成分的”人机“心灵与意识情感的故事。反过来也是对公主赛尔菲妮乐天而温暖人心、处事沉稳灵气的人性光辉和王国灵继继承者身份的立体化展现。而强大忠心又敏感谨慎的少女侍卫莉特娜，当然是选择爱她。
一部有很大可塑性和潜力的视觉小说，期待后续。

39363811.review:
起初对这游戏的印象并不是特别好

一开始看到这个游戏，以为是日式rpg游戏，能控制角色战斗那种，再加上是自己喜欢的二刺螈风格，就买了。

但玩了一会儿发现是个纯文字游戏，背景和情节也看起来非常俗套：

古魔法的世界里，亡国公主以及她的侍从莉特娜的归国之旅

这种游戏烂大街的设定遍地都是，还没有cv，稍微有些失望，而且这种架空的世界观，难免有很多难以搞懂的设定和地名

一些本来就对这类游戏没啥兴趣的人，看着这些晦涩难懂的新词更是望而却步

但是，在推完了这部作品后，发现之前想的都是错的，我只想说：

---如果被这些东西劝退的话，那就无疑错失了一部佳作

在被泼了一盘冷水的我准备一目十行的粗略过一下剧情

却没想到越玩越精彩，从一开始的滚轮滚着看文字到之后一句一句的点，慢慢推进剧情、细细品味字里行间的情感

旅途的第一站，是个类似现代的科学发达的世界。

主线是一个动人的亲情故事，还讨论了有关人工智能、人与人情感、意识和灵魂等问题

这篇的主角不像是公主和莉特娜

她们更像是以第三者的身份介入一整个故事，旁观、引导。

游戏把感情塑造描写的淋漓尽致，很久没体会这种纯粹的感动了。

人物塑造饱满，故事的逻辑和条理很清晰，完成度很高

前期游戏复杂的设定并不是无用的，作者充分利用了很多这个世界观里独有的设定，进行铺垫、成为剧情发展的“钥匙”。

虽然仅仅几小时就能玩完，但却是个非常完善的故事，短小精悍

而且情节波澜起伏，环环相扣，叙事手法精妙

关于游戏风格，比较严肃，而且有一定的致郁成分，不过结尾是好结局，请诸位放心

关于游戏的缺陷，果然还是最后的结尾处理略显仓促，关于路德的改变没有更细致的心里和细节描写，有点可惜

总的来说瑕不掩瑜，作为同人社团能做到这样很好了

综合评分我能给88分

推荐给：

文字游戏、视觉小说爱好者，以及剧情类文字游戏爱好者

一会儿玩第二部去

39254722.review: 恬不知耻的随写两句，没错，就是在期末考试期间，我还是十分作死的玩完了fault milestone的1和2，整个游戏十分简短，只需要几个小时，其实之前我几乎没有玩过视觉小说类游戏，但在看完宣传MV的那刻，我就深深的迷上了它，清新的作画，牵动心弦的bgm。故事讲述了流亡公主赛尔菲尼和护卫利特那在重返自己祖国的旅行中经历的点点滴滴：希德用生命对夏恩德承诺的践行。机器路恩心中对何为人类，何为情感的纠结与挣扎。路德在爱与无情之间的徘徊。赛尔尼亚独自承受悲惨真相的抉择。米尔的坚强，索尔的逃避与麻木，事实的残酷。人性的光明与黑暗的强烈对抗。当路德紧紧抱住路恩时，我感觉自己淹没在了如潮水般的感动中。哈哈，是呀，永远在自己脆弱的时候，人才会那么容易的感受和散发出温柔，互相靠在一起感受彼此的温度。第二部结尾将至，药剂师道出对索尔、米尔兄妹犯下的令人发指的罪行，界面上慢慢淡出：此世间再无道义，义务教诲，仅存压迫与谎言······他们想要好好活下去，守护重要的事物······然而留给他们的却只有残酷、悲怆和无意义的绝望——这就是······世界。世间有多少欢乐，就有多少绝望。赛尔尼亚选择了独自承受了这一切，这残酷的事实，索尔、米尔在善意的谎言中找到了救赎，开始了抗争，开始了新生活，可赛尔尼亚的终点和归属又在哪里呢，没人知道她心中所承担的有多重，也没人能分担，她必须继续自己的旅程，对呀，这就是·······世界呀。

39249340.review:
[h1]《fault》系列是同人創作的輕百合視覺小說[/h1]

[b](本篇評論發布於系列作第一部，內容總結milestone one以及milestone two side: above，盡量無雷)[/b]

[b]A. 遊戲簡介、特色[/b]

《fault》系列在視覺小說的市場中不算是大眾作品，既沒有CV的加持與熱賣的周邊產品加持。故事背景建立於魔法王國Rughzenhaide受到敵軍襲擊，王國的公主Selphine與其護衛Ritona被強迫逃離家園，卻因為施展魔法時發生失誤，兩人來到了不具備魔法的陌生國家……。故事正是兩人的[u][b]「逃亡日常生活」[/b][/u]作為主軸。相信各位看到這邊可能會覺得：「又是老梗劇情；又沒有可愛的配音，那你幹嘛推薦這款遊戲？」

這種背景設定在愛好閱讀小說的讀者可謂屢見不鮮，但是《fault》系列最吸引人的原因，既不是主角群的聲線優美(連聲優都沒有何來配音)；也不是畫面傑出，正是因為劇情的可看性！由於《fault》系列是同人作品，藉由文字述說故事的能力更容易被放大檢視，但是玩過這款遊戲之後，你一定能深刻的體會：[code]「劇情的起承轉合讓原本中規中矩的遊戲內容提升至欲罷不能的程度。」[/code]

[b]B. 小小心得[/b]

我對這款遊戲的簡介不能提到太多，畢竟就跟拿著一本看過的小說然後滔滔不絕地告訴你裡面的內容一樣，你會馬上刪除好友(X)，如果你覺得是百合日常賣肉類型的作品，那你就大錯特錯了。首先《fault》這部視覺小說的CG質與量不輸大多數類似作品，不論是王女；護衛；反派；甚至是劇情的主要角色都不馬虎。

↓Ritona的殺氣也能從螢幕的另一端感受到。
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1262050650

↓可愛又迷人的反派角色。
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1262613235

↓眾女角的作畫都各有特色，遊戲出現的男性就算了吧XD(其實也不差)
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1262613280

但我最想要推薦這款遊戲的原因不為其他─就是劇情的可看性，即使標上「百合」「日常」的標籤，這款遊戲的劇情張力完全[b]輾壓[/b]其他視覺小說，對角色感情的拿捏、各代作品所想要傳達給讀者的意義、不拖泥帶水，一氣呵成的讓讀者沉浸在《fault》的世界觀的洗鍊文字。原本只打算當作忙碌時的消遣作品，卻讓我在兩天內完成目前全部內容且無法自已，才有了這篇評論！

遊戲的另一優點是：中文的翻譯水準非常高，高可能不夠具體，簡單說當你玩到第二部的時候你就會懂了XD，能夠把正常的英文翻譯成這樣也是奇才(稱讚意味)。很多人覺得視覺小說不算是真正的遊戲，此處不討論此議題，或許以後也能在Steam看到電子書上架呢！我想要表達的是：作為一款電子小說，《fault》系列可以說靠著劇情讓多數玩家願意給予好評，連我也深受劇情影響，只可惜世界觀太大，劇情感覺還在起頭處，而照著遊戲出版的進度，會不會跟某一部電影的主角一樣，永遠到不了大都呢？

總而言之，如果一款作品的第一部讓人值得期待，你可以稱他為佳作；但如果連續集都讓人讚譽再三，那你可能要重新審視原本的評價了。《fault》目前僅用兩部作品，就能讓我捨棄其他重要的事情，只想要趕快知道遊戲的結局，那我就必須推薦給追求劇情為主的各位玩家！

[b]C. 整體評分、優缺點[/b]

畫面：8/10
音樂：7/10 (沒有CV究竟是加分還是扣分無從比較，只從現有的情況做評比)
劇情：10/10 (兩部作品的綜合評分)
遊戲性：X
耐玩程度：X

優點：
○CG多且優美，讓人隨時想要截圖
○比預期有趣太多的劇情，完全值得花上2個小時享受！
○中文翻譯超強！如果不習慣的也能看原文哦
○成就輕鬆取得，+1黨的最愛[spoiler]有些成就可以改系統時間完成以節省時間[/spoiler]

缺點：
●遊戲中的兼用卡不少，好像在同一個場景繞圈圈XD
●世界觀很大，出發點卻比較小，會讓人擔心畫大餅的情況(拜託不要QQ)
●遊戲中沒有什麼選項，就算有通常意義不大
●內容比較短，很容易讓人意猶未盡(給我下一集！)

懶人包：
適合在忙碌的時候遊玩的遊戲，整體時數大概2小時內可以完成，但是麻雀雖小，五臟俱全，推薦給喜歡看劇情，不重操作的玩家！

39145712.review:
I've tried to get into this game, I really have. But after two attempts I really can't see myself playing this anymore.

Now don't get me wrong; the art is well done, the world and the magic within it is interesting and the game actually does offer a way to find out about things discussed without resorting to exposition. The idea the story was going for was also an interesting one from what I could gather.
But the dialogue... I'm never certain from whose perspective the story is being told. Sometimes it's third person and others it shifts to one of the characters, all without any clear transition. What's more, the writing isn't that good either. And in a kinetic VN, the writing needs to be good to keep the reader's attention. Having played other kinetic VNs (like Highway Blossoms for example), this point becomes all too clear in comparison. The music also felt too short at times.

So, as much as I want to recommend this game, I just don't see enough here to warrant it.
4/10

38983538.review:
国家防线被击溃，王国唯一的继承人流落在外，充满活力、无忧无虑的公主殿下和严谨认真、警惕敏锐的皇家护卫披荆斩棘，历经磨难，一路上收获友谊、逐渐成长，踏上了归家的漫漫征途。
撇开袭击者的神秘目的不谈，这看起来只是个有着清晰套路的故事。然而明明知道套路，明明猜中了这一部分的结尾，却依然被感动到泪目，这大概就是Fault的魅力。
节奏感紧凑的剧情，有趣的世界观背景，可爱的立绘画风，加上代入感很强以至于一度忘记没有语音的BGM，构成了一段足以称得上难忘的冒险。
结尾部分的发展燃到出乎意料，回想一下又确实有迹可循，或者不如说全篇有很多细节并不是突兀的摆出来，而是有着仔细想来意外却又顺理成章的[strike] 魔法[/strike]依据。
所以说第一部停在这里什么的不存在的，一二部一口气通完一本满足w

以下感想w 剧透注意...？

说起来，活泼的公主和严肃的护卫其实算是常规组合了，然而直到我下意识的感慨【不愧是王族】时，才意识到Fault的用心之处。

——从有心灵的“存在”那里剥夺“意识”，是错误的。这与对方到底是人类还是机器无关。
赛尔菲妮的天真和未经世事并没有使她成为单纯卖萌的吉祥物，她通透的思想和骨子里的执着证明了“灵继”的意义——这是卢森海德之所以长存的根本，并不是随便说说而已的设定。

——约好了。绝不会让路德孤独的活着。
路德大概不愿也不敢去想希德“复活”露恩的目的，他和露恩之间的心结，只能由他们自己来解。赛尔菲妮所做的并不是“说服”，而是“引导”。她与路德的对话并没有做到什么实质上的改变，却引导着路德给了露恩一个触及伤口的机会。
这就足够了。

Playtime (without going back for achievements): 4 hours

Recommended under the following terms:
[list]
[*] you buy it on sale (it's pretty and cool, but [i] not [/i] worth $15USD.
[*] you don't mind kinetic novels
[/list]

Fault: Milestone is beautiful, interesting, and has cool music--it approaches a dynamic world in a refreshing way that is fun to explore. While the fight between magic and science is often overdone and beaten into the ground, Fault creates a world where the science and magic it has is, at its basics, different than what I've seen before. It not only creates an interesting world and fascinating lore, it introduces engaging characters with [i] development [/i] and [i] depth [/i].
Magic and science aside, the story was more focused on the story between characters, looking at the philosophy of humanity: what it means to be human, what, exactly, is a human right, and what does it mean to [i] not [/i] be human. These issues and thoughts have been addressed in stories and games before--I've even played a handful of them, but Fault does it in a [i] unique [/i] and [i] refreshing [/i] way that feels emotional and real.

38444518.review:
tl;dr: Recommended for fans of anime-style VNs if it's on sale, but not recommended otherwise.

Fault's premise is interesting enough: a princess and her bodyguard find themselves on an accidental roadtrip and have to make their way through a land where people practice science rather than magic, and where new technologies are forcing this land's residents to reconsider their assumptions about the nature of life, consciousness, and emotion. If you're the sort of reader who enjoys fantasy worlds that have clearly-established and detailed magic "systems," or if you like worlds where magic and technology bump up against each other, this game's setting is for you. 

As you can see from my play time, however, this is a very short VN. It's basically a prologue to the rest of this multi-part series, and it doesn't do a great job of setting the stage. The game starts off fantastically by throwing its heroines immediately into a dangerous voyage while hinting at the political intrigue behind the scenes, but then the narrative grinds to a halt in order to delve into its characters' big philosophical questions. These questions are addressed through a tired story that our protagonists listen to but don't really participate in, and then the game ends on a cliffhanger. It also introduces a large and colourful cast, but leaves most of its characterizations at the level of anime clichés. For a game as short as it is, it spends a surprising--and frustrating--amount of time dancing around obvious plot points and having characters repeat ideas rather than pushing the narrative forward. 

Fault's music is good: I didn't find myself humming any tracks after closing the game, but they all do a good job of setting the mood. The art is serviceable, but its quality also varies from sprite to sprite. It's obvious that the artist enjoys drawing cute ladies and, accordingly, the portraits of the central cast members look great.  Everyone else, not so much--especially the older men in the cast, who might as well have been drawn by a different, significantly less skilled, artist.

Finally, a word on the text itself: this VN could really have used another editorial pass. To be clear, this is not a complaint about the encyclopedia of magical terms that characters use (which I actually found kind of cool). Rather, my complaint is with the script, which is riddled with typos, awkward or wordy turns of phrase, and grammatical inconsistencies. (Notably: the narration will sometimes swap back and forth between past and present tense for no apparent reason.) These are sloppy mistakes; I would criticize them in any game, but they're unacceptable in a kinetic novel. 

Despite all of my griping above, I still think Fault: Milestone One is an interesting prologue to what might be a great series. I would recommend picking it up if you can get it at a significant discount in a Steam sale, but can't in good conscience recommend it at full price.

38379043.review:
일러스트에 현혹되어 그저 그럴것 같은 스토리라고 생각하신다면, 착각이라고 말해드리고 싶습니다.

명작에 반열에 오르기엔 모자란 감이 있으나, 상당한 수작입니다.

하지만 구할 수 있다면 할인할때 구입하시거나 다른 경로를 통해 구입을 하길 권장드립니다.



특징 몇가지만 알려드립니다.

1. 선택지 없음 (작품내 1개 정도)
   - 소설책읽는 느낌으로 볼 것 .
     선택지가 없기 때문에 쭉 전개됨 

2. 브금이 좋다 (몰입도 상승)
   - 개인적으로 오프닝은 별로 였지만, 작중 나오는 ost 들은 모두 좋습니다.

3. 괜찮은 일러스트 
 - 몰입도에 상승을 주는 요소라고 생각합니다.
   극이 절정에 달했을때 적절한 일러스트가 나와서 더 좋았습니다. 

4. 일본 특유의 라이트노벨 형식 

- 단점이 될 수 있는 요소라고 생각합니다.
 특히나 초반에 전개되는 오글거림 단어들, 극 전개를 보고는 사실 플레이를 망설였습니다.
조금 참으시면 
어느정도 이야기가 진행된 후에는 괜찮은 부분입니다. 

일부러 괜찮게 보이려고 이것저것 갖다 붙인 전투 기술 이름들과, 영어 사용들은 조금 오글거렸습니다.


5. 짧은 플레이타임 시간

-길면 길고 짧으면 짧다고 생각이 드는 시간이네요.
진짜 이번편은 뭔가 사건이 시작되기도 전에 서장만 플레이한 느낌이 다분합니다.
플레이 타임 시간은 텍스트 속도 조절했을때 3~4시간내외 입니다.



일본 라이트노벨 형식에 거부감이 없고,
양산형에 질려했던 분들에게 추천드리지만 

비주얼 노벨을 처음 경험해보는 사람에게는 그다지 추천도 순위는 높지 않습니다. 

1편은 플레이하면 거부감없었던 사람들은 2편은 반드시 플레이할것 같은 느낌이 드네요.

從劇情來說，前半部分輕鬆愉快的日常還帶着百合的清香；後半部分壓抑說不上但氣氛但比較嚴肅，到轉折位又有點小感動(反正我的眼上泛着淚光)，結尾完全是為了2而展開。
人物設定上開朗活潑又富有正義感的吃貨公主是推動劇情的關鍵，從頭到尾這種性格都貫徹始終。那麼主角作為認真謹慎(其實就是呆萌忠犬)的侍衛就當然是負責收攤子。路德一家的親情還是大家去體會。[spoiler] (既兄又有妹那么兄。。。我又懂了)[/spoiler] 
完全的視覺小說沒選項，而在fault這你會完全體會到有CV的重要性。中文文本也好英文文本也好日文文本也好，無論在語氣上和劇情本身推進轉折上，都很適合有CV的配音來渲染氣氛[spoiler] (其實我只是想听听病嬌的語氣...嘻嘻嘻)[/spoiler] 
總而言之十分推薦各位入手，不過那兩個DLC的確是貴了點入不入手就考慮一下。

38257354.review:
先说下推完的建议：很好的作品，挺推荐的，大概说下自己的感受
首先音乐方面，BGM都还不错，但也说不上极好。这个游戏是没有配音的，如果有配音的话会更精彩。
剧情方面，流程比较短，以一段主要人物的经历为第一章主体。故事穿插了很多哲学方面的思考，尤其是对“神”和科学之间冲突的描写我个人觉得非常精彩，就冲这点我都觉得我买了不亏。
人设方面，我觉得部分角色颜值和主要人物差距有些大，背景一般般，人物动作方面也有些僵硬，故事有些短很多人物塑造不是很充实，期待后续作品的补足吧。
有简中好评，打折后买很合适。
以上为个人感受，我心中评分的话：7.5/10

fault - milestone one is a linear visual novel with focuses on telling a story, with the player being an observer.
The game is set in a magical world where everything is focused on magic  – "manakravte" – which is used in almost every aspect of life.
The whole story revolves around the magick-user Riton and her royal bodyguard princess Selphine of the kingdom of Rughzenhaide.

[i] This game has such a beautiful artworks and great story with lovely characters like Rune, Ritona & Selphine. [/i]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1082180634

[h1] Overall [/h1]
[u] This game has some surprises and emotional scenes. [/u]

38025625.review: 我啊，完全被这故事勾走了魂呢。仅几个小时的游戏时间，几个富有魅力的角色和一个逐渐展开的精彩故事就呈现在我眼前，结尾的超展开让我迫不及待地想玩下一部！

37999027.review: 精美的画面，细致的人设，很用心的去完整的讲了一个故事。这故事，有萌点，有泪点，有看点；重友情，重爱情，重亲情。整个故事娓娓道来，把各式各样的小冲突融合在一个较为平稳轻快的大节奏中使得整个游戏体验轻松愉快而又不会平淡无奇，在整个逃难过程中公主开朗活泼的性格被体现的淋漓尽致（实际上是个吃货萌妹温柔可爱的小天使-大雾），通过对一连串事件的分析与判断，公主的正义感与责任感极大地扭转了事态，并且这些正义并没有通过很俗套很矫情的嘴炮来体现而是通过公主自己细致的观察与温柔来水到渠成的去展现给玩家（这公主真的超有自知之明）。同样，希德与夫人之间的爱情，路德与妹妹的亲情，与对人性的剖析，呆萌的护卫，突然出现的御姐杀手都是本作的亮点。期待第二部

由于自己是唯物主义论，所以从很小的时候就惧怕死亡。因为明白，一旦人的肉体失去机能，所有的意识，情感，记忆也会随之消逝。

37544309.review:
The kingdom of Rughzenhaide is under attack by an unknown army. To save the life of princess Selphine, her royal bodyguard Ritona casts a teleportation manakravte (a magic spell pretty much) to escape the fallen kingdom. However, something goes wrong and they end up being transported to the other side of the world. From there, Selphine and Ritona begin their journey back home, meeting and interacting with people along the way.

That's pretty much the plot of the Fault series. And yes, I'm going to be briefly talking about the series as a whole rather than this visual novel by itself. While I do feel that Fault Milestone One is a great visual novel and could be enjoyed by itself as a stand-alone visual novel, the rest of the series is absolutely worth checking out after you've finished reading this one.

The first time I read Fault was around 2015, when Milestone 2 Side: Above wasn't even out yet. First time I read it, I liked it. I definitely wasn't blown away by it, but I enjoyed it well enough. Then the second visual novel came out and I'd say that would be the point where I really started getting into the series. I started seeing the potential of Fault being an amazing visual novel series and how much worldbuilding can be done with it. It caught my interest, and to this day I want to see this series grow bigger and better... And that's exactly what it's been doing these past few years.

Fault - Silence the Pedant is going to be released in 2018 (assuming there aren't any major delays anymore), which tells a story about Ritona 5 years before the events of the first Fault. The demo to that is already out and is looking like the contender for best in the series by far. Then Milestone 2 Side: Below will continue the main story. There's also the comic series [url=https://sekaiproject.com/world-of-fault/]World of Fault[/url] which expands the universe of Fault and makes it feel more alive, "[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/753220/Mhakna_Gramura_and_Fairy_Bell/]Mhakna Gramura And Fairy Bell[/url]" (a children's book in the Fault universe) is going to be released on Steam soonish, and even more things to come! It's mind-blowing! I haven't seen this much effort and detail put into a world or setting in most higher budget or better known visual novel titles or series. It's what I think makes Fault stand out as one of the best visual novel series that I've ever read, and I wish more people would read it.

In closing, Fault is a precious gem that's buried under a bunch of other less obscure titles. So far all the visual novels are short and don't really last longer than 10 hours or so, but with all the worldbuilding and small details put into it, it's one of the most beautiful and amazing universes I've seen in fiction. If you're willing to wait a while for the next entry in the series to come out, Fault is definitely worth a read.

37165747.review:
Scroll all the way below for TL;DR / Summary

[b]THIS GAME IS NOT FOR YOU IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A CHOICE BASED VN / SEVERAL VARIATION ENDINGS / FAST UPDATED NOVEL / ONE SHOT VISUAL NOVEL[/b]

This VN focuses more on the story rather than fan services etc as compared to the newer VN's I have seen circulating around. It has definitely exceeded my expectations in terms of storyline etc as I was only expecting a typical "fight, run away, come back, save kingdom" kind of story.

This novel only has one definite ending and there is no choice making, language friendly and is available on several languages, props to the translators for their hardwork! This CGI's are incredible in this series among with the storyline, you'll find the starting slightly fuzzy due to their several difficult words to understand with all the kravte , commkravte , manakravte etc. There is also a sequel to this novel which I highly recommend getting due to story progression although it may take awhile for their next sequel to come out. The characters personality are rather unique, [spoiler]especially Selphine, there is a plottwist in the following sequel towards her personality.[/spoiler] The storyline is rather easy to understand, about their journey outside of their homeland, afew plot twists here and there but the story is atleast proven not to be so predictable.

Pros :
Great CGI
Good grammar
Great Soundtrack
Available in many languages
Character development is strong
Easy Storyline to understand
Less fanservice more storyline

Cons :
Focuses more towards only one character development at a time
A little bit pricey especially since there will be afew sequels, but worth it
Difficult to understand afew words at the start (You will get it, don't worry)
Rather slow story progression (if you like a good long read, I guess this could be a pro!)
Not much known in the intro (Please read the new series "Silence The Pedant" a plot before this take place)

This novel has been ongoing since 2013 and I will continue to stay and support it. The wait may be long but their improvements are good. Definitely worth the read! Do check up their official page for updates on story progression.

欢迎入组：fault - 赛尔菲妮殿下皇家护卫队
-------------------------------------------------------------

被画风+魔法题材吸引在秋季特惠入了这款比较小众的视觉小说游戏~
本来以为自己玩不进去？毕竟这种类似看电子小说的玩法又没有CV（据说因为经费不足？）
挺容易让人感到瞌睡、无聊，然而该作剧情节奏把握得不错，无聊生硬的对话很少，感情铺垫很到位，人设又很戳我（公主与护卫），人物性格也塑造的很成功，很讨人喜欢。

走进魔法，跟着落难的公主踏上归途，不一样的世界，不一样的国家，遇见各种各样的人。
随着剧情推进，悬念一点点展开达到高潮。


说说不足之处：
1.如果成就系统做得更认真点，好看点以及徽章用主人公的话想必会更受欢迎。
2.游戏动画场景过少
3.配音的话也算一个，毕竟有的话 整体感受会更好些

36896652.review:
[h1]这绝对是目前视觉小说综合实力的天花板[/h1]
[strike]当你点下购买健，充实的将不只是g胖的钱包[/strike]

[b]恭喜你，打开了新世界的大门[/b]

作为一部本质严谨，外表卖乖的视觉小说，从题材上来说，就已经显得清新脱俗。
没有使用惯常的恋爱喜剧，也没有刻意追求中二，一切的一切，都显得恰到好处。

精美的人设，充实的剧情，严谨的逻辑，独特的风格都是这部作品的厨力源泉。
最重要的是，他构建了一个可以任意拓展的世界观，在这片魔法与科学并存的桑·阿雷兹塔大陆上，有的不仅仅是逃亡公主和随从的奇幻冒险，还有众生百态，每一个区域，都有着属于自己的异世界故事，会有怎样的展开，完全是任君想象的，而作者只需要对主线剧情的推进进行补完，确定主基调[strike]（慢着，确定这不是型月的做法吗）[/strike]

10/优秀的人物塑造 
  萌白甜的公主，骨科晚期的兄妹，还有傲娇而又认真的强力护卫莉特纳[spoiler]（悄悄抱走~）[/spoiler]另外，有些出现时间很短的角色也给了精美的立绘，业界良心！

9/业内顶尖的美术和演出效果   
  其实画工这种东西仁者见仁智者见智，只能说作者挑对了画师，能够完美契合作品的背景和风格。几次转场过渡的动画都行云流水，只是一直没搞懂介绍中的3D镜头系统是什么东西，不过多角度的运用和cg的变换确实能让人产生身临其境的现场感。

9.5/颇具特色的BGM   
  还是那句话，这部作品闯出了自己的风格，以至于风格本身把作品本身为数不多的缺陷都弥补了，带动作品中的各个元素都集体加分。

10/可拓展的世界观

9.5/无处不在的细节  
  对于任何一部游戏，如果能使玩家完全沉浸，就可以说是大成功了。而要做到这一点，细节的把控尤为关键。而不论是UI设计，还是字体、LOGO，甚至于中文的翻译，都能够带给人“啊！这真的是一个完整的异世界”的感觉，可见打磨这件作品确实是有呕(tiao)心(piao)沥(li)血(you)的。[spoiler]没错跳票我们能等，真的，真的，真。。。。的别再跳票了啊，玩不到新作我要死了！[/spoiler]

总的来说，这是一部本篇优秀，而又十分具有拓展性的作品，可以预见的未来，如果ALICE IN DISSIONANCE有野心和能力的话，完全可以放开同人制作，对这个世界进行完善。[strike]看来有生之年能看到超越三大同人的存在了。[/strike]

36631166.review:
Fault – Milestone One ist eine Visual Novel von ALICE IN DISSONANCE.
Zunächst zum Gameplay, dieses besteht nämlich nur aus klicken. Es gibt eine einzige Entscheidung im Spiel zu treffen und wofür man sich entscheidet ist vollkommen egal, bei einer der beiden Möglichkeiten erhält man lediglich 4 Textboxen mehr zu lesen.
Die Handlung ist eine gute Mischung aus Fantasy, Action, Comedy und Drama. Die gesammte Geschichte ist sehr gut geschrieben, wenn man mal von den Rechtschreib und Grammatikfehlern in der deutschen Fassung absieht. In der Mitte zieht sie sich ein wenig, bekommt aber noch  rechtzeitig die Kurve und wird wieder sehr spannend und sogar bewegend. Die Charaktere lernt man im Verlauf der Geschichte immer besser kennen und fiebert auch mit ihnen mit. Nur die beweggründe der „Bösewichte“ sind mir nach wie vor nicht zu 100% klar. Die Story endet dann mit einem ordentlichen Cliffhänger.
Optisch ist fault ganz große Klasse. Die Charaktere sind durchweg gut gezeichnet und es gibt viele Hintergründe die auch alle gut aussehen, auch wenn einige mehr Details hätten vertragen können. Die Eventbilder sind dafür umso besser und werden auch sehr gut in Szene gesetzt.
Die Akustik ist auch gelungen und unterstreicht die jeweiligen Ereignisse sehr schön, was eine sehr gute Atmosphäre schafft. Die Charaktere sind leider nicht vertont aber bei der Menge an Text der zu sprechen wäre, wäre das auch etwas viel verlangt.
Insgesamt eine der besten VN´s die ich kenne und die mich sogar zu Tränen gerührt hat. Wer dieses Genre mag sollte sich fault nicht entgehen lassen, allerdings nur wenn es im 50% Sale ist, 15€ finde ich doch etwas happig. Am besten auch gleich im Bundle mit Milestone 2 holen, welcher die Geschichte gekonnt fortsetzt. Auch Genre-einsteiger könnten fault eine Chance geben und Achivementjäger haben auch etwas von dieser Geschichte, denn die Erfolge sind recht leicht zu bekommen.

36509069.review:
Kinetic novel, has one flavour choice that affectss 5 screens of dialogue, nothing else.
A really pleasant game, though has some common problems, being a first episode - prologue dumps info about the whole world, filled with almost-german-but-not names, only to ~15 minutes later change the game's location into an unknown place where there are new rules. I guess we feel as clueless there as the protagonists, but their common world is still almost entirely unknown to the player/reader, so it's a bit less effective.

Otherwise, the story is good, but there's nothing revolutionary or outstanding. Getting to know the new location, having a mystery that I guess everyone realizes hours before the potagonists, then memories and feelings happen, with mandatory thoughts about what makes a human human; emotions; differences between people and mindsets, the usual stuff. I enjoyed the game, but this is the usual game-level of philosophy: fundaments of ideas packed into an attractive, nice game, not really more than food for thought. But that's fine, it's enough to deal with a topic or issue, no need to be in-depth.   
The game handles these messages better than Eden* - there the second half felt overstretched, with no real events nor new ideas appearing, the joy of simple life being in the centre. Here because of the sameish mindset of the two protagonists, and the memories / dialogues of 2-3 other people provide variety, and more insight of the multiple topics that are discussed in the game - family, psychological problems, colliding cultures, technology and people. It provides variety, and the topics are surfacing at some points, or follow through the game - presented in a different manner for each.
Long story short: a well-written VN about interesting topics that don't go too deep but serve a purpose for the story as well, and the game's art + music contribute a lot for it being an enjoyable experience.
(I'm horrible at focusing on reading stuff on computer, hence my inflated gameplay time. Game is about 6-8 hours I guess)

36472728.review:
Insofar as storytelling and visuals go, fault does a pretty incredible job at both. I'm actively trying to avoid any spoilers, so this may sound a bit vague.

This is a visual novel without much in the way of choice, but if you're here just for a pretty solid storyline and execution--well, you've found quite the gem. The characters are enjoyable and stick to their initial characterization, building up their backstories, flaws and strengths over the course of the game. Obviously some have less screentime than others, but no one actually seems to suffer for that. Every scene has a purpose and, to my recollection, every piece of knowledge in the game's self-contained story--which is different from the overarching plot of the series--is answered flawlessly.

The narrative doesn't really go off on tangents and what introspection it offers, as VNs are wont to do, doesn't drag on without contributing something else to the current situation. Even the silliest and seemingly least important scenes have their place here and instead of lingering on the joke they capture that funny moment and then move onto the rest of the story.

Fault - milestone one is a beautiful, well-executed VN. If you're not too curious about the Kingdom of Rugzenhaide and what the future has in store for its princess and her guardian, milestone one can stand solidly on its own and you can daydream your own followup story to your heart's delight. But given all the love, hard work and effort that went into milestone one, I sure as heck can't wait to play the followup.

Присоединяюсь ко всем положительным отзывам, добавлю и свою каплю в общую массу положительных эмоций.

Игра стоит каждой потраченной на нее копейки и даже больше. Интересный сюжет (вторая часть жди меня!), прекрасная музыка, все отлично прорисованно, перевод на русский язык (за это прям отдельное спасибо, приятно наслаждаться хорошей игрой, не залезая в гугл по 5 раз в минуту. Потому что лексика явно не из самых простых). 

Берите, не раздумывая ни секунды! Отличные игры (и их создателей, ofc) надо поддерживать морально (и материально).

36414724.review:
又是迟来的好评，比m2a的还要晚。这绝对是懒惰。
“可是我这一部没怎么干活啊……”
大概就是抱着这种心态，愈发地拖沓了。

谈到这一部，等到好评如潮的时候发好评，就有一种趋炎附势——
咳咳。
就有一种实事求是的美德在其中。好评，证明了其价值。价值的核心，在于追加的倒悬莉特娜色纸，莉莉有倒悬之急真的是太——
咳咳。
最近天气干燥，嗓子不是很舒服。
价值的核心，在于munisix的写作与AiD成员们的制作。话虽如此，写作我尚且可以假装很懂，制作我是真的完全不懂。后一方面我只能说，在视觉小说界这部作品的bug真的是少。
这不就挺棒的么。
更让人感兴趣的是munisix的写作。我在m2a的评测里基本是在强烈鼓吹情节和人物塑造，这两点在本作里并不是很尽我意（但是真的相当不错）。这一部立刻让我对munisix其人肃然起敬的原因，在于他笔下的世界真的很hollow。
这个系列的作品拥有一套我们能代入角色却无法代入世界的设定。本作的辞典（以及m2a的辞典和World of fault），只给出了能让人通顺阅读的相关注释，但这个世界是怎么来的呢？又是什么样的呢？在m2a当中，赛尔芬妮讲了有关五神创世的神话，也只是神话而已。给出的国家与地理，也不过是些框架。玩家需要通过阅读更多作品进行摸索与拼接。然而相比于庞大的世界，munisix愿意给出的信息真的是少之又少。这种游戏体验实在是相当hollow了。
仔细想想，本作最开始的叙述便是魔法使用者的特权与灵继，及其带来的文化大繁荣与扩张，再向前也无从谈起。基于神话的创世，或者并不存在的创世，无论哪种都十分地hollow。
这真是太棒了，虽然还有更hollow的。
如同我们并不需要真正知道宇宙是如何起源而活着，赛尔芬妮与莉特娜也不需要知道她们世界的本质而活着。人在世间大可以自行决定自己行动的意义。莉特娜与赛尔芬妮身上特有的发达国家自豪感与荣誉感驱使着她们遵从自身的善良拯救露恩，这对她们而言是完成了自己对自己的期待，即身为人的仁德与仁爱。
然而人终归是存在于世界中的人，世界为你选择的位置，你或许意识到了，或许没意识到，直到你正确地认识了客观世界。赛尔芬妮与莉特娜选择营救露恩，代价终于在本作结尾与m2a显现出来。她们根本不知道梅拉诺是否会当场放过她们，也不知道这背后的一切动机。如果梅拉诺当场杀死她们，营救露恩的选择是正确的吗？而梅拉诺并没有这样做，这又能证明她们的选择的是正确的吗？莫要忘了这个系列本身就叫fault，一个munisix坚持f必须小写的fault，美好与正确不一定是并行的。这一连串事情之后，价值判断却无从做起。
真是hollow的游戏。或许这是游戏界的一种新风尚。众筹游戏界的风尚。
我不得不承认，m2a中公主殿下指点江山令我过于激动了。结合本作再来看，这种贯穿始终的hollow别有一番韵味。赛尔芬妮与莉特娜的敌人超越了这个世界的常识，即使如此她们的意志并没有转变。这种意志在面对未知时的坚定不移未必是正确的，但是她们的选择却跨越了面对未知的hollow感，这个行为本身就过于hollow了。三军可夺帅也，匹夫不可夺志也。我们称颂勇猛的同时，也忽视了对正确的判断。更为要命的是，价值判断即使是在我们现实社会也是相当hollow的，可这个系列的作品偏偏叫fault。狼子野心的作者些hollow命题的作品，这是难以想象的潜力。
（请不要问我为什么hollow来hollow去的，总玩hollow的众筹游戏是有害身体健康的，最后就会变成我这样。）

上大人munisix有言，他最喜欢的角色是梅拉诺。看来是hollow爱好者一枚。
我最喜欢的角色是赛尔芬妮，因为她的伟大，我在m2a的评测里写了很多。她小小的身体里负担着十分沉重的职责，让她多睡一会儿吧。
（可是早起也是职责的一部分！）
除了赛尔芬妮，我最欣赏的是可可。
她站在另一个立场上，选择为梅拉诺而战。
穷人或许会被物质收买肉身，但不会被物质收买意志。
卢森海德所矜夸的是其所享有的强大国力与人民富裕的生活，他们在国内废除了货币流通，实现了最广泛的按需分配，国民无不赞美王室，赞美他们所拥有的君主庇护下的繁荣与安宁。
卢森海德所领导的联盟以外的地方，未必如此繁荣安宁。而卢森海德的昌盛是以什么为代价，我们无从知晓。
我们只知道，可可是个穷人。她是一名工匠，甚至不是战斗魔法使。
时机出现了，她是梅拉诺集团的一员，率先攻上了天台。
她直呼赛尔芬妮的名讳。对她而言，公主的头衔毫无意义。
我们不知道她究竟为何而战。她现在为梅拉诺而战。

摧毁王宫和推翻卢森海德王室的伟大人民，敌人正计算他们心脏跳动的强弱，难道人民会在绝望中，坐待饥寒把他们最后一滴血也在心脏里冻僵么？——不！
人民永远不接受这些苦难和耻辱。他们知道：现在还来得及采取使劳动者能活下去、使人人能起来战斗的坚决措施：
普遍征发物资——免费配给口粮——群起出击。
从卢森海德承袭下来的政策、战略、行政都已受到判决。让位给人民！让位给梅拉诺集团！

石头门玩得压抑，这个游戏玩的很舒服，这个游戏背景架构很完整，甚至有词典这个选项，玩这个游戏只要看对话不用多余的操作就感觉像是看一部动画，比动画好的地方在于每一副画面都是不用快进的，每个场景画面都不是多余的，不会像看动画的时候有很无聊的感觉，一口气玩到通关

36366246.review:
Pese a tener una muy buena trama e historia, tiene algunos puntos malos como VN. Esta primera parte es muy corta, por eso tiene una segunda entrega, bien pudieron haber lanzado el juego con las dos partes sin tener que soltar pasta para comprar los dos y a un precio mas razonable (por lo tanto, si quieres seguirle a la historia si o si debes adquirir la segunda parte). El juego no tiene voces :/ una pena, puesto que hubiera sido mejor con Seiyuus. No esperes que el juego tenga decisiones, ya que solo cuenta con una decisión a lo largo del juego (sólo hablo de esta primera parte, aún no juego la segunda).
Dejando eso a un lado, el juego tiene una increible banda sonora, muy buena ambientación y el diseño de personajes como sus caracteristicas son buenos. De paso, decir que la historia está detalladamente elaborada que hasta incluso hay un glosario de palabras referente a la trama del juego.
La duración del juego no es mucha, ya que acaba en la mejor parte (ALICE IN DISSONANCE sabe muy bien como hacerte darles money) lleva alrededor de 7 a 8 horas, y con todos los logros hasta 10 hrs (el logro sociópata es el te va a llevar 2 horas para sacarlo, literal). Recomiendo comprar el Pack Fault Complete Edition cuando esté en oferta, asi podrás aprovechar el juego.

36219408.review:
fault. Powiem szczerze nie spodziewałem się czegoś tak dobrego, z początku myślałem, że będzie to jedna z "tych japońskich produkcji" w których to słaba (a w najlepszym razie przeciętna) fabuła spotyka się z mnóstwem dziewczyn i nadmiernym epatowaniem golizną. Myliłem się. To co zobaczyłem to: świat stworzony z niebywałą precyzją, dobra i przemyślana fabuła, która choć wolno się rozkręca to ostatecznie po jej poznaniu nie ma się wrażenia że te przeczytane ściany tekstu to tylko zmarnowany czas , niezła ścieżka dźwiękowa, a po zakończeniu po prostu chcesz wiedzieć co będzie dalej.

Z nieciekawych stron należało by wymienić długość niektórych utworów, które mogą trwać na oko 15 sekund, a zanim przeczytasz wyświetlany tekst zdążą się powtórzyć z 40 razy oraz szybkość wyświetlania tekstu podczas wprowadzenia do gry.
Ujmę to w ten sposób zanim zabrałem się za granie musiałem dwa albo trzy razy je oglądać żeby nadążyć co statecznie i tak mi się nie udało więc włączyłem YouTube i tam je dokończyłem :-P. Ostatnią sprawą do której można by się przyczepić jest poczucie humoru które miejscami bywa drewniane ale nie powiem ma też swoje dobre momenty.

Jednak jeśli to wam nie przeszkadza, lubicie Visual novele w których nastrój jest budowany stopniowo, a fabuła gra główne skrzypce to mogę wam śmiało polecić fault milestone one.

Lo primero y mas importante, este juego no se puede considerar una novela visual al completo, me explico, la unica opción que nos da el juego a elegir es 1 y además esta no tiene influencia en la historia. 
Dicho esto que era importante, tratemos ha este producto como un relato corto, puesto que no tura mas de 4 horas la historia de esta primera parte. La historia es fantastica, tiene una narrativa muy buena y engancha, en mi caso el juego me lo termine del tiron en una sola noche.
Finalmente lo recomiendo de rebajas puesto que este juego me a costado 4€ estoy muy contento de haberlos utilizado, pero por 15€ probablemente habria terminado el juego y al mismo tiempo trataria de reembolsarlo, puesto que la duración no va muy acorde con el precio. Pero repito si este juego lo encuentras a menos de 10€ compralo, por que sera una historia muy conmovedora.

35944188.review:
fault - milestone one
前言：这是一部和外面那些卖肉卖立绘的视觉小说截然不同的视觉小说，这部作品非常完美的融合了亲情，友情.
优点：
+动态UI
+良心的配乐
+让人眼前一亮的世界设定
+引人入胜的剧情
+精美的CG
+代入感强
+性价比UP
+官方良心简体汉化
+有卡片
+有成就
缺点：
-无CV（有没有其实也不是很影响毕竟视觉小说）
-游戏时间稍短（考虑这个是第一部，意义不大）
总评：优大于弊，制作精良的视觉小说，剧情方面没的说算是我目前看过的很多视觉小说当中也是属于上乘的科幻剧情小说，剧情方面作者打了很多伏笔，基本第一部打出来的都在这一部作品当中用到了，作者特地向玩家介绍的概念基本都是有意义的，可以用于后面对于剧情的理解上面，剧情也非常的饱满，两个小时打出了五个小时的感觉.强烈推荐玩家购买游玩！

35869500.review:
[h1] Это... Божественно... [/h1]

Пишу на эмоциях, после прохождения второй части извините за ошибки...
 В общем познакомился с игрой благодаря другу. Как раз распродажа была... И я как большой любитель Вн-ок купил обе.
После 20 минут игры, я не был впечатлен. Можно даже сказать мне не понравилось. Сюжет показался избитым, ГГ-шки не нравились из - за кажущейся туповатости. Я выключал ее каждые 30 минут. [strike] Но все - же я возвращался. [/strike] Спустя где - то 2-3 часа я худо - бедно проникся сюжетом. Вроде играть стало хотя - бы не дискомфортно. Все изменилось [strike] Конечно же в лучшую сторону [/strike] когда началась история Рун. Тогда сюжет стал принимать неожиданные, хватающие за сердце повороты. К трогательному моменту истинного воссоидения Сары с братом я уже почти плакал.
 А теперь я вроде должен дать оценку, да? 
[list]
 [*] Музыка - 10/10. В нужных местах она трогательная, в других веселая, в других напрягающая. (Например при появлении Мелано)
 [*] Рисовка 10/10. Выполнена очень приятно, в мягких тонах и линиях. Персонажи не блеклые. (Для любителей лолек здесь вообще рай.)
[*] Сюжет... 10... нет 20/10. Нужное я уже сказал, остальное сами увидите при прохождении.
[/list]
     Напоследок хочу сказать: [u] НЕ ЗАБРАСЫВАЙТЕ ЭТУ ИГРУ НА СЕРЕДИНЕ [/u]
Это все. Надеюсь я достаточно описал всю шедевральность этой игры. Не жалейте на эту игру денег, если хотите испытать сильнейшие эмоции, и любите визуальные новеллы, созданные не для того, чтобы фапать на них, а для того, чтобы вникать в историю, переживать за главных героев и потом сидеть и тихо поплакивать в углу - эта игра для вас.
 
[spoiler] Ритона и Рун в моем сердце навсегда. (Но это не значит, что мне не понравилась Сельфиночка, она тоже няша :3) [/spoiler]

35866350.review:
先说说“视觉小说”这个体裁。
    作为表达开发者思想的工具，它是足够胜任的；作为游戏载体，它也不合格的，因为没有哪怕一丝游戏性。
    私以为视觉小说有三大要素：故事、画面、音乐，分别对应灵魂、肉体、服装。
    衡量一款视觉小说成功与否首先要看它是否有个引人入胜的故事，假如连故事也没有，那显然只能降格称之画报。
——有个好剧本是做成视觉小说的前提。
    其次是视觉。眼睛是心灵之窗，视觉小说能否第一眼就抓住购买者，优秀的图画不可或缺。
——这需要一个成熟的美工，能把故事到位的表现出来。
    最后是听觉。在画面和故事之上进一步包装，只有音乐动听才能称得上视觉盛宴。哪怕只有一段出色旋律也会令人难忘。有句广告词就叫：没声音，再好的戏也出不来。
——这需要一位好的音乐制作人。
    由此可见，视觉小说的制作丝毫不比一款大作来得容易，相反，因为游戏性的缺失，唯有以上三要素面面俱到才能成为优秀作品。
    来看《fault》
    它的画面无疑是合格的，日漫风格，水平至少是中规中矩的，再退一步讲，其中对美女的刻画是能吸引到人的。
    再来说故事。fault讲述的故事不能算创新，因为起点上太多类似幻想文，fault的水平顶多算在起点十年前的水准上。严格来说，算不上引人入胜。
    说到这不得不提最大的败笔，就是对话内容的空洞无物，又臭又长，严重剥夺了读者的耐心。而或许篇幅所限，导演对镜头与文本的结合安排也略显生疏，大段旁白文本的出现与视觉小说这个主题背道而驰。
    最后是音乐，只能说很一般，听过就忘了的水准。
    总体来说这部作品，至少是本章，并不成功。只有中规中矩的画面吊着一口气，而这恰恰是视觉小说最基本应该做到的。
    最后提一句文本。
    既然是小说，文本是提领三要素的纽带。相信任何人见了梦呓般的语句都不会有继续阅读下去的欲望，空格键很棒。
哪怕你是配上一段旁白，也不要让角色在那咿咿呀呀。

评分：★★★☆☆

35861056.review:
Ну что сказать, я в огромнейшем восторге! Это одна из самых лучших новелл, которые я проходила, если быть предельно объективной. 
А почему же одна из лучших, спросите вы? А я вам отвечу, что у этой новеллы безумно интересный сюжет, ты сопереживаешь главным героям каждой клеточкой своего тела, чувствуешь радости и печали героев... В игре присутствует отличная музыка, также по желанию в главном меню можно поменять музыку (это действительно приятный бонус). Рисовка в этой новелле восхитительно красивая, проработанная, просто глаз не оторвать, очень интересные герои, особенно понравилась Рун, но конечно бы хотелось по больше узнать о Сельфине и Ритоне (возможно, они раскрыты во второй части, но это не точно). 
Да и в общем, хочется сказать, что игра (новелла) своих денег, безусловно, стоит. Я не буду расписывать более подробно все, потому что нету смысла, как по мне, это не нужно для этой новеллы, по крайне мере пройдите ее, и вы поймете, почему я так говорю (можно скачать с какого ни будь сайта бесплатно) Так что, закончу на этом. Оценку поставлю 9 из 10, так-как нужно покупать вторую часть (а я не хочу, так как там нету русского языка, а без него тяжко) 
И да, чуть не забыла, в конце игра держит в некой интриге, что и заставит (возможно) вас, купить ее!)

35842793.review: fault прекрасная новелла , и если вы не являетесь противником кинетических новелл , то должны обратить на неё внимание . Яркие и интересные персонажи , захватывающая история и крайне интересный мир . Из минусов могу выдилить любовь ALICE IN DISSONANCE , завершать на самом интересном месте , как в первой части так и во второй . А в остальном всё более чем прекрасно . Можно сказать , что fault является для меня практически эталоном визуальных новелл . Развивающаяся с каждой частью , захватывающая до самого конца и даже дольше , яркая рисовка контрастирующая с жестоким миром . Всё это и ещё несколько факторов , делают её в моих глазах практически идеальной . Я уверен , что если вы рискнёте она вас не разочарует ( Да пока русификатор на fault - milestone two side:above отсутствует , но он в планах команды Sun-team)

第一次写评测（包含剧透）
对于这部作品（仅第一部，不含dlc）还是满意的，BGM满分，立绘不算优秀但尚可接受


故事背景设定宏大，魔法与科学相互交织，最后的boss？的出现确实大吃一惊，但结尾戛然而止却令人失望。（这是新一轮骗买手段？？）
故事剧情确实不错，单论露恩和路德和父母辈的故事，但对于主人公的塑造就不行了，剧情过于顺其自然地发展，一个亡国公主进入一个新世界从惶恐到适应毫无铺垫就转变，直到最后公主的印像也只有一个观察者的形象而已。而且很多地方的剧情也没解释，露恩为何对公主产生兴趣不得而知；酒馆事件竟然没有后续，所谓的敌视魔法使也只是口头上说说罢了，最让人吐槽的是选择支对剧情毫无作用。（要是加入dlc有所变化那我抱歉）
总结：7分推荐

HB大包入手，都说好我就开始玩了起来。怎么说呢，这个游戏要是不进包或是低于-75%其实我是不会买的，但我还是要给好评。（只是个人观点-游戏素质还是值这个价钱的）                                                 
其实严格来说本座并不算是一款游戏，因为全程几乎没有啥可操作的，就是点点点看剧情。所以本子的重要性就看出来了。虽然魔法+科学的世界观设定也不算新奇了，但是环环相扣的情节推进真的是十分吸引人，说是让人欲罢不能不为过。
不过单以我个人眼光来看，本座的人设立绘其实是有些不足的。除了几个主角妹子，很多人物都有些呆板和简陋，甚至略崩。比如一开始，黄毛的表情变化就是换了换嘴，多少显得有点违和。
大爱莉特娜，我一般不会对[spoiler] 胸这么小[/spoiler]的妹子有感的

괜찮은 스토리의 비주얼 노벨입니다.
인물들의 갈등도 깔끔하게 잘 나오고, 스토리 라인도 잘 짜여있으며, 세계관도 확실하며, 세세한 설정들도 잘 되어있지만 진입하기 어려울 정도로 빡센 세계관은 아닙니다. 게임을 키면 문명마냥 백과사전이 하나 있는데, 굳이 안 읽고 플레이 하셔도 문제는 없습니다. 
백과사전은 그냥 아 이런 설정이구나 하면서 보시는 정도? 게임 텍스트만 잘 읽어도 못 따라갈 정도로 컨셉질이 난무하진 않습니다.

끝까지 읽다보면 왠 철학에 대한 이야기도 하고, 한번 쯤 고민을 해 볼만한 이야기도 나오는 등 담고있는 의미도 꽤 괜찮습니다. 자세한 내용은 스포일러이므로 생략..

플레이 시간은 4~8시간 정도, 보통 사람은 6~7시간 정도 걸릴 것 같네요.
CG는 총 24장, 영상은 5개가 있습니다. 아쉽다면 아쉽게도 일본 게임의 서비스 CG는 없습니다...

35445448.review:
这游戏上次hb日呆包入的，最近闲来无事拿出来玩，竟然意外地发现是一部相当不错的作品。
听说该作是日本一个同人社团做的，本来刚玩的时候还在想怎么没有cv的配音，后来真正关注起剧情就会发现讲一个好故事才是最重要的，配音这种事情有最好，没有也不计较了。
一开始玩以为是那种架空世界的冒险故事，而我向来对这种与现实没什么关联的幻想故事不感冒；但后面才发现本作实际上讲了一个有关家族的亲情与爱的故事，以及对人的感情生命这类话题做了一些合理的探讨。
具体就不过多剧透了，毕竟游戏流程不长，一个下午基本就能通关，就一个选项而且不影响剧情发展，对剧本向玩家是个不错的好游戏。

35081617.review:
Здесь не будет полюбившихся всем кошкодевочек из Nekopara и тебе не придется скипать диалоги [strike]грудастых[/strike]  очень грудастых девиц с предсказуемым сюжетом из Sakura Angels. 
Разработчики из ALICE IN DISSONANCE просто собрали нужную сумму на Kickstarter и просто выпустили конфетку!

[i]Сюжет[/i] fault - milestone one рассказывает нам о двух героинях Сельфии (Принцессе) и Ритоне (Верной слуге и подруге детства по совместительству), на Королевство которых напали непонятные захватчики, стремящиеся убить всю Королевскую знать, в том числе и нашу юную Принцессу. Дабы избежать нападаения, они срочно телепортируются в безопасное место, куда им, собственно, и не получилось попасть. Оказавшись очень далеко от дома, им предстоит познакомиться с новыми персонажами и их историями. Звучит примитивно, скажите? Путешествие начинается в одном из Полюсов, где не практикуется магия, а люди используют науку, о чем наши героини, естественно, никогда не слышали. Вам не придется скипать разговоры героев, потому что сюжет далеко не предсказуем и каждые диалоги содержат свои тайны, о которых ты и не догадывался [strike]если только чуть-чуть[/strike] . 

[i]Персонажи[/i]: Вы можете не ждать здесь любви между девушками (по крайней мере в первой части), здесь нет погони за парнями и тд и тп. Тут показаны достаточно адекватные персонажи со своим уникальным характером и такими же отношениями. 

[i]Аудиосоставляющая[/i]: В самом начале меня не зацепила звуковая дорожка, которая играла на фоне диалога. Какая-то однообразная мелодия и мне просто пришлось выключить звук на время. Но по ходу прохождения музыка разбавлялась всяческими звуковыми эффектами, звучало пианино, в общем ушам было приятно слушать подобное. 

Игра расчитана на более зрелую аудиторию. В плане того, что здесь подняты вопросы человеческой воли, свободы эмоций и важности семейных ценностей. 
И если вы сравниваете данную новеллу с "Волчица и пряности", то вы глубоко ошибаетесь. Здесь все намного мрачнее и загадочнее, как кажется на первый взгляд.  

Ставлю 10 Рун из 10.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=895200936

34638171.review:
To a fault, the story of this visual novel takes its time to reveal itself.  After the initial tense encounter, the narrative then takes the reader through a series of seemingly unrelated diversions before tying things up and reaching a satisfying conclusion at the end.

[list]
[*]Selphine and Ritona are so cute, they are wonderful protagonists!  (I won't mention anything about Rune, to avoid any spoilers.)

[*]This visual novel is completely linear.  The story should be read and cherished on its own right, without any expectation for the reader to control the game at all.  There are like one or two decision points in the game but they do not appear to significantly affect the overall plotline.

[*]This isn't a romance or dating sim, which makes this such a nice diversion from the multitudes of other visual novels out there.  fault is a fantasy adventure story about a princess and her guardian, taken into a faraway land.

[*]I found some of the world-specific technical terminology used by the game to be somewhat distracting (similar to technobabble in Star Trek) as opposed to drawing me deeper into the world.  But the distraction is minimal, and I'll also be the first to acknowledge that other readers may disagree with my opinion and wholeheartedly soak up the geek-kravte.

[*]This visual novel is the first chapter of a series so there will be many loose ends after the conclusion.
[/list]

34560197.review:
Visual novelki to wciąż towar egzotyczny, jeśli chodzi o steamowe asortyment. Łatwo podzielić je na te drogie, nieliczne i dobre oraz te trochę tańsze i beznadziejne fabularnie crapy. Fault stoi jakościowo pomiędzy tymi dwiema kategoriami, jednakże ten tytuł czuje ciągotę do tego drugiego typu. 

Zacznijmy od fabuły, bo ona w grach tego typu gra pierwsze skrzypce. Historia w fault jest bardzo przeciętna i nie wybija się absolutnie niczym. Osoba bez większych zdolności literackich mogłaby sklecić coś takiego w klilka dni. Postacie też nie zachwycają. Ich osobowości nie są zbytnio rozbudowane, ale też nie są za bardzo irytujące  Jedyną wartą wzmianki postacią jest postać Selphine, która wybija się ponad inne uroczym usposobieniem i projektem postaci przypomina wesołego, merdającego ogonem szczeniaczka, stanowiąc za razem jeden z nielicznych plusów tej opowieści. 

Skoro już projektach postaci mowa, to tutaj ponarzekam już mniej. Wspomiana wcześniej Selphine i inne postaci zostały zaprojektowane całkiem nieźle, choć nie wybijają się za bardzo ponad średnią. NIe oczekujcie tutaj również tutaj możliwości wyboru czegokolwiek. To klasyczna opowieśc na szynach gdzie zadaniem gracza jest tylko przeklikiwać dialogi, choć co prawda pojawia się jeden wybór, który i tak nie ma żadnego wpływu na przebieg fabuły. 

Parę słów wypadałoby powiedzieć również o ścieżce dźwiękowej, która jest po prostu dobra. NIe wybija się zbytnio ponad przeciętność, ale jest przyjemna dla ucha (np. motyw grany w głównym menu, który w połaczeniu z znajdującym się tam obrazkiem, wpawia nas w melachonijny nastrój, sprawiajac, że zamist klilknąc start (bądź load), zatapiając się grafice przez ładne kilka minut) i dobrze pasuję do klimatu całości.

Pomimo jednak tylu negatywnych słów w grało mi się w Faulta bardzo dobrze i mogę przypiąc mu łatkę swoistego guilty pleasure. Osobiście jednak, jeśli cenicie swój wolny czas lub macie duże wymagania co do prezentowanej treści odradzam ten tytuł. Przejście go zajmie wam od 9 do 13 godzin. Zdcydujcie sami czy to jest gra warta świeczki.

34430338.review:
Finally, I was able to finish the first Fault game. I just realized how much this game can consume your time with achievements.

My Personal Opinion :
Graphics - 8/10 (Graphics and Art is Decent.)
Gameplay - 4/10 (Aside from Transitions and camera zooms, there really is little to no gameplay which means its like a novel your reading, what would you expect from a lot of VN like this.)
Story - 9/10 (The story is the building blocks of this VN, So much details in its world.)
Sound - 6/10 (Didn't really like some of the music but others hit hard at the right moment.)
Series - 8/10 (The Series itself was growing popular thanks to the first Fault, and after reading and finishing the game I can tell that the story is well worth it.)
Overall rating - 8/10 (The game itself is like Episode 1 of the whole series, the whole VN centers around Selphine and Ritona as they help Rune in her past, though it gives little story about our Selphine and Ritona but lets just hope the good story will get over in the next game.)
Is it worth it? - Yes but do purchase it in discount or bundle.(The game itself was worth it, if you like emoticons about the characters, Profile backgrounds was so bad its just background scenery image of the VN.)

Last Note : Selphine was Pure, Ritona was Cool, Rune was so lovable, anything else? The characters are the only thing that attracts me.

34402686.review:
This is an interesting little tale. I'm not sure how to explain it properly. It takes place in a world where magic takes the place of most technology. And it is entering the period of upheaval from royalty to more modern forms of life. The main characters are a princess and her knight-guardian. And they are trying to find out what force is behind the upheaval that has entered their lives.

It is the first of at least three parts (and a prequel that should be out sometime in the last quarter of 2017). Part 2 is in 2 pieces, Above and Below. At least according to the VNDB...

Anyway, I can recommend it. Though, fair warning. One of the achievements requires you to replay one scene 50 times, and another wants you to stare at a specific CG for 2 hours...

34386894.review: Alright - good characters and an okay setting, with pacing problems and inconsistent art quality. The story manages to intrigue and make the reader keep going, but the resolution is rushed and clichéd, and not enough questions about the overaching plot or the world are answered. That said, it is a fun journey that's not too lighthearted nor too dark, and the main characters have captivating enough personalities and motivations. A short, pleasant visual novel that could have had more substance.

34367574.review:
[h1] 纪念一下我steam上第一款通关的文字类AVG——《fault》	[/h1]

[list]
    [*]在游戏体验上，《fault》可以说给了我不小的惊喜。游戏中用动画的形式演示魔法效果，以及在人物对话和场景交待时运动镜头的展现，配合汉化水准颇高的文本，给了我很强的代入感。

    [*]很喜欢这款游戏的画风，整个游戏的故事架构很不错，有一个比较完整的世界观。制作租也很用心地在游戏中加入了“辞典”来向玩家解释游戏中出现的一些专有名词。

    [*]故事中登场的角色并不多，但每一个都给我留下了很深的映象。

    [*]在故事的中后半段，个人感觉叙述节奏稍快了一点，给我一种“前期设下的悬念一股脑地全抖了出来”的感觉。稍快的节奏，也导致了整个故事的流程并不长。[spoiler] 其实是完全不够玩啊！喂！还好它还有续篇 [/spoiler]

    [*]如果能有声优配音的话，就再好不过了
[/list]

总而言之，整个游戏非常棒，给了我与以往AVG和galgame不一样的游戏体验，很期待赛尔菲妮一行之后的冒（bai）险（he）故事！[strike] 百合什么的真是太棒了！咕嘿嘿~	[/strike]

34320136.review:
原声音乐真的是无话可说。。
尤其是标题界面的那一首纯音乐。配合着流云的背景和公主与护卫二人的身影不知道多么有意境。每次登录游戏都会静静的闭上眼睛，听一会儿那首BGM。配上剧情中的设定，亡国的公主的逃亡之旅。虽然很让人静得下心的音乐但是其中却让人在平淡之中感受到暗流涌动，暗示着公主目前的状况不容乐观。
其他场景的BGM也很好听，每次进到一个新的场景第一件事就是听完一次BGM。
人物刻画的也很饱满。公主虽然在逃亡的路上，但是却可以忘忧。那么的纯真。最喜欢看到公主笑了。
护卫的形象也一样。武功高强，有责任心。虽然平时一副冷脸，但是也有可爱的，作为女人的一面。
露恩，知道了你的故事，我真的非常难受，错的不是你，错的是这个世界吧。但是你的父母，没有放弃你。最后承载着前世的记忆的你，终于可以和最爱的哥哥和解，拥抱。其实我想和你说一句 对不起。在看到你突然180度大翻脸的时候，我居然在想等公主逃回国了以后，开始了对外扩张，在征服了一切之后，来到外域，来攻打你的国家的时候，你会是什么表情。
但是后来我太傻，不知道你是机器人的我 居然有那么过分的想法，sorry露恩。天性单纯，藏不住表情和心情的你，可以遇到她们，一起旅行，真的是太好了。


唯一的缺点   太短了。。。根本不够看啊。。那么大是世界观啊。。。快出新作吧~\(≧▽≦)/~

34313123.review:
Всем доброго времени суток, вот тут решил на досуге написать свою никому не нужную критику, на которую, кстати, будет всем все равно. 


Для начала хотел бы выделить довольно скудненький сюжет в первой главе, который никак вас не затянет. Основная проблема первой главы то, что не показывают харизматичных героев, от этого текст становится достаточно унылый и диалоги просто-напросто не интересно читать. Но как только вы пройдете первую главу вы наконец-то получите то, за что вы заплатили (или получили бесплатно, все зависит от обстоятельств), вы наконец-то увидете харизматичных, интересных героев, проработанный от начала и до конца мир и конечно-же интригу (как же без нее), которая будет продвигать основополагающую сюжета. Кстати, от начала и до конца ваше приключение будет сопровождать прекрасная и проработанная музыка, также приятные на глаз CG и фоны, которые прорисованы до самых мельчайших деталей.
Каждая глава открывает новые детали в сюжете из-за которых основное понимание сюжета время от времени меняется.
Если коротко и ясно, то обязательна для прохождения, многим любителям почитать новеллы - понравится. 
А если короче, то:
Сюжет: 7/10
Музыка: 12/10
CG и фоны: 9/10

剧情涉嫌抄袭《神雕侠侣》小龙女私下终南山！活泼可爱的公主分明就是小龙女嘛！

一款令人饶有兴致的VN游戏。游戏时长大概3-6小时，全程基本没有选项，所以我很干脆自己做了一个鼠标连点，全程当作自动阅读的小说。剧情上虽然有些牵强，不过节奏把控得当，一路上的所见所闻没有令故事变得冗长乏味。世界观的设定差强人意。人物塑造上某些角色有些突兀，有些套路模版化，不过在短短三个小时的游玩过程后，我很期待继续畅玩下一部作品。

全成就的获取：[spoiler] 观看血腥CG，其实可以简单通过调整系统时间，直接往后改动两个小时即可。观看换衣场景50次，解决酒馆事件后，赛尔菲妮说“你会帮我们做衣服吗”此处快速存档，直到大叔说“当然的啦你以为老子是谁啊”然后快速读档，如此五十次即可。两个成就全程不需要五分钟。[/spoiler]

[spoiler] 评分：5/10[/spoiler]

34240293.review:
Fault milestone one can be considered the first episode on a multi-part series of static visual novels (No branching into different endings), it has a great story, a really interesting fantasy world that has politics, economy and society in mind. The world itself is well thought, but not perfectly excecuted as I feel they could have done, political relationship between countries are not as deep as one would think and has some plot holes here and there, but overall it has a good story for an episode 1.

The art on this vn is very well done, from the cg's and the character portraits are clear and has a lively color palette; the music has good variety a couple really good songs along with some duller pieces. 

That being said, there is a huge problem with this vn, I know it is supposed to be an introduction for the episode 2 and later on for the precuel, but the ending feels just wrong. There are ways to create a cliffhanger, but the way thy did it here just feels bad.

tl;dr: Good Story, but needs a deeper approach, music and art style are well excecuted. Akward ending. 8/10

34227488.review: 看了一下评测，大多数人都是3个小时内就通关了，我确用了6个小时，可能是我读的比较细的缘故。对于fault，不管对哲学知识是否有涉猎，我都极力推荐玩一下这款游戏。fault不管在世界观的架构，人类情感的描述上都有着哲学的影子，例如“外域”和“内域”，“理性”和“感性”，有许多人表示对结局无法接受，毕竟用世俗的标准来看的话她是如此的不可原谅，但是我觉作者的真意并不是要让我们表面地理解这段故事，而是要引导我们思考何为“存在”。BGM是相当的不错的，特别是主页面，BGM响起，碧蓝的天空，悠悠的绿草，配上浮在空中的白云，明明是极为普通的画面，却给我极大的视觉冲击。总体来说是一款有深度的作品，不能单纯的看剧情，要带有一点主观思考去体验，打了折后也就几十块，非常推荐大家购买。最后不得不说我看哭了，除了爱情外，确实是还有很多值得我们去珍惜的东西。

34221106.review:
This was my first visual novel experience. And ironically probably my longest review, but it's for others like me who have never read one of these before.

I've always been skeptical, and I guess that's for good reason now as I can't say I had the greatest time with this one.

So, I'm not really honestly sure if there are any actual merits to this game. There very well could be, as evidenced by the Very Positive majority of reviews on here. But I think they are mostly from people, who know exactly what they're bargaining for when installing this "game".

I played the first chapter of the story honestly for the sake of experience, but then lost patience and scrolled through the rest of the game for the achievements. I got the full visual experience, but didn't care much for the story at the start. It definitely plays like a VERY SLIGHTLY animated, color manga.

There are a few stills throughout the game that were neat-looking. There's not really fan service in this one, so if you're looking for that it's not in here. The characters have some cool designs, and there were a few that looked pretty cool in their big scenes. But otherwise, it was rather dull.

The characters were kind of meh, and really there is just no visualization. They will be seen moving their mouths and maybe making an arm gesture or two, but otherwise it's all left up to your own noggin. That would be my #1 problem with this, and the entire genre if they're all like this. I was hoping for a little more to watch unfold on screen, rather than just clicking away at dialogue scrolls.

It requires a lot of imagination to put this story together in your head, and I'm not saying I don't have that but it was difficult. You get sped through a prologue and then left with a few characters in an action scene where there is no actual action on screen. It's all in words, and it just never really draws you in.

I got this in the Humble Bundle and I don't feel ripped off, but I'm definitely one game closer to having a solid opinion/feel for VNs.

Get this one if you're interested in the genre or subject matter, otherwise I'd look for something that that contains a theme, character, style, etc. that really piques your interest. This didn't seem to have anything particularly special about it, other than it has good reviews and a sequel (which I will now scroll through for achievements as well).

34215412.review:
全流程2个多小时，有些短，如第二章前情提要所说，第一章描述了少女露恩和哥哥间的羁绊。拥有已经死去之人的记忆的个体是否可以说是说是同一个人呢？这个问题还是蛮值得思考的。本作作为魔法和科学共存世界的开篇，还没有铺展开本作的主旨，第一章可以说是招募队友的一个小品剧了。
开头的序章很抓人，以一个悲伤的故事引出了全篇。



作为一名纯死宅，我不可救药的喜欢故事。靠故事来体验日常生活中不曾有的喜怒哀乐，看藏在日光下的生死别离，阴谋阳谋的笔尖对决。
我渴望真实，渴望美。我愿意花时间阅读一本倾注了心血的书，我厌恶虚假。
以前接触过一些所谓gal,大部分不喜欢，人物画风过于低龄和萌化，剧情如果作为小说来看不入流的居多，靠卖萌和打擦边球来吸引人。
本作是玩的下去的第一款gal，画风精良，且有完整的世界观设定，在初阅读的短短十几分钟我是作为一名读者沉浸在其中来看这个故事的。能有这种体验已经说明本款作品没买错了。
我个人认为视觉系小说对CV并没有很大的需求，因为一行行文字配上图片阅读这种体验更像是在看漫画而不是看动漫，人的阅读速度是比CV一句一句来读要快得多的，galgame即便有配音我也没有耐心去一句一句听下来。把有限的资金用在画师和画面上会有更好的体验，这就是阅读本作最大的感触。
最后不得不提的是，日本的视觉系小说基本都是日常谈话语境里的galgame，都会有日系风格的美少女，且情节来说偏向个人主义，定位我认为更适合青少年。偏写实的作品实在是罕见。

34171841.review:
This novel is basically Star Trek in a fantasy world. The main protagonists come from a pacifist kingdom with a violent past that managed to resolve its problems and even got rid of money. At the beginning of the story an unknown force attacks the kingdom and princess Selphine and her bodyguard Ritona are forced to retreat. Those forces are led by a woman, Melano, who seems to be omnipotent. By accident the two protagonists end up on another continent near the pole region that has nearly no mana. Since people there cannot use magic they solve problems using science. Selphine and Ritona have to leave quickly or otherwise they will suffer from mana shock and will never be able to leave the continent. They meet a girl called Rune, who helps them out buying equipment. When Rune tells them to meet again the next day, they are greeted by Rudo Zhevitz the CEO of a large local company. He tells them that Rune won't come for a dramatic reason [details would be too much of a spoiler]. At this point we are already at chapter 3, but now the real story of this episode unfolds and discovers the dark history of Rune and the Zhevitz family. 

This is also the main issue I have about this novel. It nearly takes half of the chapters for the main story to begin. But it’s really worth it. The artworks look great, with the exception of some less detailed backgrounds, and the music is also very good.

It is interesting to read how different common problems are solved by this manaless society. There is some technobabble to explain certain things in the world. As a Star Trek fan I welcome it. Speaking of Star Trek; you will find a lot references while reading this novel, starting with Ritonas uniform and other things like the Aeroratum which acts like a Universal Translator. Or just read the intro of the first chapter: The kingdom sound pretty much like the Federation. Their rulers have a technique to pass to all of their experience and personality on to their successors which reminds me of the Trill. Of course there is also a mind melt scene. Melanos character is like Q. One of the last chapters is even named after a famous TNG episode which’s name would be a big spoiler. In my opinion the story of this novel captures the essence of Star Trek better than any of the new movies, even though it has no space ships.

If you like science fiction and fantasy, you will probably like this visual novel. If you’re still not convinced, just try the demo. It will let you read half of the chapters. The demo made me buy the novel and its follow-up episode.

34112370.review:
I received this game through one of the humble bundles, forgot about it, and then in a desperate bid to procrastinate completing one of the many games I have installed - downloaded this game, instead. When I first started it and realized that it is, literally, a visual novel (i.e., no real interaction from the player other than clicking through text) I felt disappointed. 

5 hours later and I can't stop fucking reading because the world, and its story, is extremely immersive. The characters are pretty cute, sure; but honestly, I keep mousing over the Play button because the plot is so interesting, and the art is really well drawn. The mysteries are genuinely intriguing, and the amount of effort and creativity the developers put into the lore of this world is absolutely worth appreciating. It's worth buying while it's on sale if you're on the fence about VN's where you don't have a lot of "real" gameplay; but I'm recommending it because I urgently just checked my library to make sure I have the second game in the series already. 

tl;dr if u like creative concepts & great art play this game my friend

Edit: after beating it the game only got better RIP

34109671.review:
I've been at almost 1h and I'm BORED to tears.... And even a bit offended. I feel my IQ plummeting the more I click click click.

This is NOT a game.
As a novel... it's the worse. Inane arguments, useless blah blah blah and often just "...." in 1h I can sum up what I've learned in 4 short lines:
-World with Magic
-Forces attack and take a castle and go after the princess.
-Princess and her guard escapes by teletransportation but they don't know where they have arrived.
-Princess´guard is a pacifist?

Do you think it can be any good if that is all you learn in 1 hour?

Then there is the visual part, drawings are OK. But useless. It fails to illustrate anything, it's mostly people just standing there and minor facial expressions changing. 
Since the writing is so uninteresting and lacking I would expect that at least the drawings will give me some information. But they don't. They don't illustrate anything, they don't show anything, they don't add anything, they rarely provide details...

In short: 
If you want a game: AVOID.
If you are a reader: AVOID
If you like drawings that are interesting for more than a glance: AVOID
I guess just... AVOID.

33901524.review:
中～近世ヨーロッパ風の剣と魔法(?)の世界を舞台に、王国の有事に対する窮余の策として
世界の裏側にワープしてしまったルゼンハイド王国のお姫様・セルフィーネと
その護衛で主人公のバトルクラフター・リトナが故郷を目指して旅をする冒険譚
『fault』シリーズの序章にして第一弾、それがこの『fault milestone one』です。

ビジュアルノベルというジャンルでは珍しい方なのではないかと思いますが、
主人公のリトナが立ちはだかる困難に対して積極的に行動を取っていくタイプなので話を追っていて面白く、
また、登場するキャラクターたちもそれぞれ価値観をもってぶつかり合うので飽きさせません。


本シリーズは主人公達の帰郷録の過程で【主人公達が出会う人々とのヒューマンドラマを描く作品】と謳ってある通り、
この第一作『fault ms1』においてはセルフィーネ一行が王国からの離脱先の地域で出会う、
自らを「ルーン」と名乗る謎の少女の話に飽くまで終始しています。


また、システム周りもユニークで便利なUIを持っていることも評価したいポイントのひとつです。

●E/Jキーのワンボタンで即座に英語/日本語の切り替え
●VキーでSelf-voicing systemという機械音声ながら英語文章を読み上げてくれる機能
●PageUpキー等での読み戻しはシーン自体を巻き戻すことができる

等々と何気に嬉しい配慮がいっぱいです。


公式ホームページも素晴らしく見やすいので興味があったら下記URIより訪れてみては如何でしょうか。
http://projectwritten.com/
【本タイトルOP】
https://youtu.be/mvuWlqxtB7A

33898861.review:
很早就通关了，刚刚通了2来补个评测。

[h1]+加分项[/h1]
[b]精美的CG[/b]：相信很多人都是冲着精美的CG来玩的吧，fault系列的CG简直不能更赞！
[b]BGM[/b]：虽然没有哪首BGM十分出众，但是每一首BGM都非常恰当到位。对于一个VN来说，BGM不仅仅是要好听，还要和剧情合理搭配。fault的BGM属于耐听那一类的。
[b]剧情[/b]：情节发展很棒！如果仅仅只对本作的故事而言的话，无论是在叙事节奏还是在剧情来说fault都是很优秀的。比起只追求人设好看CG萌但是剧情空洞的游戏来说，fault这样的游戏明显更加出色。
[b]人设赞[/b]

[h1]-负分项[/h1]
[b]剧情无分支[/b]：整部作品没有能影响剧情走向的分支选项，因为本作好像没有选项（似乎有个不重要的）。不过结合第二部，我个人倒是有个推测，在下一点说。
[b]主线发展[/b]：本作的中心剧情实际上应该是讲露恩的，但是很明显莉特娜和公主回家这条线才是更重要的主线剧情。但是这部作品却没有把重点放在主线本身。这使得这部作品很难作为一部独立作品去定义，不过结合同人作品这点就很好理解了。其实，我在通关后就开始思考这个问题。结合了第二部的剧情走向，我也更加确定了我的想法。仔细想想，这部作品难道不就是一章剧情吗！如果把每一部都作为一章，那fault本身的主线剧情立刻就丰满了起来。而且如果不把每一段剧情拆分开来，做多支线就容易了许多啊。但是无奈同人社团本身能力有所限制，不太可能做成一部。而观察这两部fault，官方肯定是野心很大的。StP的大致剧情也应证了这一点。
可是不管再怎么说，作为一部独立的作品，本作的世界观几乎都没怎么用上。可以说这是本作不多的几个欠缺的地方。

8.5/10

33818522.review:
“稀薄到几乎没有的游戏性[spoiler]（只能看）[/spoiler]，
 [spoiler] 但是人设好萌！[/spoiler]
  过于简单直白的叙事手法[spoiler]（流水账）[/spoiler]，
  [spoiler]但是人设真的好萌啊！！[/spoiler]
  芜杂到自己近乎不能驾驭的设定[spoiler]（坑太大）[/spoiler]，
  [spoiler]但是人设实在是太萌了！！！[/spoiler]”

我是那种感性的玩家，会因为一段视频，几张图片，以及数行简短的介绍而悠然神往。我想象着这段故事，并开启了这段旅行。而当终章的音乐响起时，既不是拊掌怒喷“垃圾游戏”，也不是拍案叫绝“宇宙神作”，只有淡淡的满足感。它近乎完美地回应了我的期待，甚至稍稍给了我小惊喜。
所以，我在这里劝大家，如果你在浏览页面时产生过一丝悸动，那么就不要再犹豫了。或许，它并不惊艳；但相信我，它所陪伴你的短暂时光，绝对不会成为你所悔恨的虚负年华。

至于游戏本身，这里就不剧透了，只做个大概的评价。首先，由于这是系列作品的第一作，首章与终章主要是为整个系列服务，略显突兀，但并不影响本作核心故事的完整性与观感。其次，本作是纯粹的“视觉小说”，没有任何交互式的玩家体验，也没有多结局可供选择，所以只需要静静欣赏就好了。同时，本作的叙事手法，悬念设置等其实并不高明，但氛围烘托，BGM渲染等都做得很不错。即使已经猜出了结局，丝毫没有影响我被感动地一塌糊涂。最后，也是最让我惊喜和担忧的一点，作者似乎不甘于制作一个简简单单的[strike]日呆[/strike]游戏，所以他赋予了游戏独树一帜的背景设定与超脱于一般感情之外的思考。如果成功，整个作品的内涵都将得到升华；而一旦失败，只怕会彻底迷失于混乱之中。庆幸的是，本作似乎取得了一定程度的成功，至少让人[spoiler]（闲得蛋疼的我）[/spoiler]在闲暇之余[spoiler]（蛋疼之时）[/spoiler]会进行[spoiler]（日经的）[/spoiler]有益的[spoiler]（哲学）[/spoiler]思辨。

33793799.review:
I was familiar with the 'visual novel' genre but during the Steam Summer Sale I came across a lot of these '[i]anime[/i] visual novels' (AVN for short) that seemed like a different genre altogether. A lot of these AVN show an abundant presence of huge cleavages in their screenshots, so it's clear a large part of them are aimed at a male adolescent audience, and it's safe to say the story won't be the most important element of those AVN. 

But there were AVN that seemed different, so when my friend [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28971565/]Athravan[/url] from [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ReviewersGuild]The Reviewers' Guild[/url] had a spare key for [i]Fault – Milestone One[/i], an AVN that gets 'very positive' reviews and doesn't revolve around cleavages, I was happy I could give it a try.

In summary, I'm very disappointed with [i]Fault – Milestone One[/i]. It's nothing but a badly written, badly translated, paper-thin, slow-paced story with no character depth at all. 

This had me thinking about the possible reasons why a large majority of the reviews are positive, mentioning 'great AVN', 'great storytelling', 'great character depth', and so on. I know all people are different, but it's simply not possible that so many people have never read a book, saw a film or played a computer game that's [b]actually[/b] well-written, [b]actually[/b] has a great story, [b]actually[/b] has great character depth, and so on. I mean, if you read 10 random books, watched 10 random films and played 10 random story-driven games, you'd have found at least 29 better stories than the one told in [i]Fault – Milestone One[/i].

So the reason why so many people praise this inept story is a mystery to me. Maybe I failed to deduce from my brief look into the AVN genre that it's aimed entirely at a pre-teen audience, and most likely at an Asian pre-teen audience to boot. [i]Afterthought: this indeed appears to be the case, at least partly, judging from several juvenile comments that contained nothing but insults and swearing. These comments have of course been deleted.[/i] Fact is, [i]Fault – Milestone One[/i] isn't meant for adults, although I'm not claiming no adult could ever possibly enjoy it, of course, and it seems to be extremely heavily influenced by modern East Asian children's storytelling, to the point it may come across as unworthly to Europeans, Americans and Canadians.

[h1]Graphics and sound[/h1] 

Graphics are static and typical 'manga' style so either that's your cup of tea or it isn't. Allow me to digress here for a moment by saying I could never understand the Japanese way of drawing characters. I mean: be it JRPG, anime, manga or yaoi, 95% of the characters are pale white people with large eyes. These are all Japanese forms of art, telling stories made up by Japanese writers, but it seems no Japanese artist can stand seeing Japanese people in their creations, as they hardly ever draw anyone who looks even remotely Japanese. I thought that was weird 20 years ago, and it still strikes me as weird today.

Music is on a loop, of course, but [i]Fault – Milestone One[/i]'s tunes are very short, so even though it doesn't sound too annoying by itself, the music does get repetitive quickly,

Sound effects are sporadic but sound okay. There is no voice acting.

[h1]The story (no spoilers)[/h1]

The story is paper-thin. It tells of magic (called 'manakravte' in [i]Fault – Milestone One[/i]) and half of the first chapter of the novel consists of people talking 'technobabble' about the magic system and its unimportant minute details. The other half is people arguing childishly about everything and nothing. I actually expected the line "I know you are but what am I?" to pop up at any time.

The first character we're introduced to, is one of the four main antagonists and supposedly a mighty mage (sorry, 'manakravter') but she has a very puerile mentality and throws a hissy fit every other time she speaks. 

The protagonist is a princess who flees from her castle because the antagonists just invaded it. As of chapter 2 of the novel, we follow her on her travels. It didn't take long before I got bored with the uninteresting 'adventures' of our princess and the trivial conversations she gets into. The story isn't just paper-thin, it's also badly written. So I switched on 'Auto-Skip mode' (yeah, so that's a thing – speaks volumes!) to see the whole visual novel race by in a matter of two minutes, collecting most of the Steam Achievements in the process.

The English translation isn't very good. I'm not a native English speaker myself, so when I'm frowning every few lines of text because I know it's not in correct English, there's something seriously wrong with the translation.

It's also hard to know if the author is trying to be funny or if he's just using strange wording to express an idea (maybe the bad translation is to blame for this, too), for example:

[quote]The girl addressed as "Marie'shelle" waved her hand in a 'yo' pose, as if she was joking.[/quote]

[quote]"Really, the last two guys I just killed--- they were such pushovers, it kind of ruined the moment! Like I'd get more of a thrill from dreaming in an afternoon nap."[/quote]

[quote]An imaginary question mark appears atop Marie'shelle.[/quote]

[quote]Marie'shelle strikes her 'yo' pose once again.[/quote]

Another thing that quickly started to bother me is that every other line of dialogue contains one or more ellipses (=three dots) and every fifth line or so, you get a 'line of dialogue' containing nothing but the following:

[quote]"………"[/quote]

Sometimes even several times in a row! Using ellipses to indicate a slight pause between two lines of text is often unnecessary, and here it completely loses what little meaning it could add because of sheer overuse. You may note that one of the five screenshots of the AVN on the Steam Store Page shows this very line of 'dialogue'. 

By the way, of the other three screenshots that contain dialogue, two show a childish insult and one starts with an ellipsis, so you see I'm not making it up or spouting unfounded criticisms here.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]

There is none. It's a linear visual novel. You click the left mouse button or use the scrollwheel to read on. Well, I'd be lying if I didn't add there is one (yes, one) point in the novel where you're asked to make a choice. But it's a choice without consequences, merely an expression of opinion. You select either "Yes, I think he'd interfere if he were here" or "No, I don't think he'd interfere if he were here". And that's it for 'gameplay' and 'choices matter'.

There's a prologue which shows an introduction to the story of [i]Fault – Milestone One[/i] like it was a cutscene, meaning you can't control the speed of the text shown during that prologue. Each of the prologue's text remains on your screen for the same amount of time. When your screen is full of text, it's impossible to read it all before it disappears. And other times only a few words are shown on the screen for too long. 

[h1]On Steam's extra features[/h1]

[i]Fault – Milestone One[/i] has 7 Steam Trading Cards. You'll get 4 while running the game.

The 12 Steam Achievements are easily broken down into two categories: 9 are unmissable, story-related achievements and the other 3 are achievements that require you to perform a ridiculous task, only meant to increase the average hours played of this AVN. Let me tell you about them:
[list]
[*] keep [i]Fault – Milestone One[/i] running for 2 hours while one particular picture from the 'encyclopedia' is your active window;
[*] sit through a specific part of the visual novel 50 times;
[*] finish the game in both English and Japanese.
[/list]
For all three, there are workarounds (advance time on your Windows clock, use the scrollwheel to scroll back and forth through the scene 50 times and use the 'Auto-Skip mode' I mentioned earlier) but it's still a silly collection of 'achievements'.

This is definitely one of the fantastic games that I have ever played. The most impressing scene of this game is the hug of Rune and Rudo and their mom's memory, it brings me the feeling of what emotion is and how important emotion is to human. I have lost my true emotion for a long time, and I recently find that I am numb about emotion because I feel nothing about breaking up with my girlfriend. Maybe I don't truly love her because she always lies to me, but she stays with me for a long time, I should feel something, but I didn't. However, this game tells me the meaning of emotion - to feel alive like a human, and emotion is born from our memories and experience. That's important to me, and I hope anyone who cannot feel real emotion or has been living under lies for a long time to try this game, it really save my heart.

P.S. Selphine and Littena are so perfect~Rune is so cute and pure. I love them all!!!!!!!!!!!

33667406.review:
制作组仅是一个同人社团的观念先入为主，作品的质量让人非常惊讶。[strike] 是我过去对同人社团的概念有什么误解么？[/strike]
　　故事发生在一片魔法盛行的大陆，一些地区也出现了科技的萌芽。关于大陆与魔法的设定都能在游戏内的“词典”中查找，从完整的世界观也可以窥见制作组试图构织一系列宏大故事的野心，更多详细设定应该还会在续作中补全。

　　画面上色耐看，妹子立绘精美，男性显得粗糙，甚至有些不协调。  酒馆的场景令人印象深刻，露恩被误伤、莉特娜出手，这一部分的演出也可圈可点。开篇的冲突作为一个小高潮，参与角色的性格中的都第一时间得到了展现。此后故事流畅展开，主线推进恰到到处，剧情中穿插着适量日常，张弛有度，有些缓缓道来的感觉。但大量使用括号引入心理描写，这算是描写上的一种下乘。

　　遗憾的是游戏后期悬念的缺失——露恩的身份挺好猜的，真相也在不少人预料之中。

　　游戏中也插入了一些蛮有意思的对话，摘录几句。

        [quote] 惩罚这种概念呢，并不仅仅是为了矫正犯罪而存在的。它必须要成为能矫正犯罪者的心理和态度的系统。赔偿和道歉不过是它的副产物。要说的话，不过是个形式罢了。[/quote]

33597757.review:
(TL;DR at bottom)
Fault is a series of cinematic novels that are released in milestones (episodes). Currently only two of them are out, with a prequel story just announced. First off, I just want to say that the artwork and music in this are fantastic. They are gorgeous and well done, a pleasure to view and hear. This is probably this game's biggest selling point in my opinion (apart from the story itself). Because of these amazing aesthetics, the game environment feels real and tangible, allowing you to immerse yourself seamlessly into the world. And what a world it is. The setting of this story is very well explained through a mix of straight exposition and character dialouge. This is part of the larger fact that the story is very well told. The writing is simple and easy to read, but conveys a complex and wonderfully deep story. Although it may be lacking in some areas, it is a deeply touching story full of equal parts comedy, tragedy and drama. 
Unfortunately, not everything is rainbows and happiness. There are also a number of cons when it comes to fault. I mentioned earlier that its aesthetics were its primary selling point, but that being said, the selling point is kinda high. I managed to get both them when they were on sale, and looking back, i definitely wouldn't have bought them full price. As gorgeous as they are, and even with how amazing the story is, they're just too short. This may be because I'm a fast reader, but I got maybe six to seven hours out of both milestone one and milestone two. Compared to other visual novels, that's ridiculously short for the full price. But hey, maybe that's just me being a broke college student. The other con is that it isn't voice acted. Although it didn't bother me so much because it reads really well and didn't need the addition of voice actors, for the price you pay I feel like it would have voice actors and I was kinda dissapointed when it didn't. The only other complaint I have is that I really want milestone three! 
All in all, I don't regret buying Fault and I'll probably buy the next release "Silence the Pedant". (Even though I'd rather have milestone three).

TL;DR
Pros
-Gorgeous aethestics
-Fantastic story

Cons
-High Price
-No Voice Actors
-Really short

33439861.review:
If you're any sort of stickler for stories, and don't enjoy medicorely written ones, don't get Fault: Milestone. 
It has interesting potential, but it basically shows exposition down your throat every five minutes and can't decide if it's a third person or first person. It also can't keep on track. From what I can tell, the Fault: Milestone one starts off on a semi-decent foot, and it has lots of potential to get better from there. But then it's like "lol no", and literally sends the protagonists to the other side of the world. Not that that's a bad thing, but with how bad the writing/translation is, it's a slog. I've only played two hours, and so far I've had to re-read multiple sentences due to the english just not being right. It's hard to flow over, so you have to specifically read each word to understand, instead of skimming and compiling it back in your head, like you normally would.
Oh, and I'm pretty sure it's never understood the word "Subtle".

33286203.review:
我们迄今仍未知道众多的psychomeres粒子在不可见世界里徘徊了多久，我们只能通过时而深思细嗅、感受到它的命名者福尼尔·达尔贝所传递过来的文学气息——诸如灵魂、意识等人内而外物的放逐理论以映射到现实产生持续交流价值。本作fault - milestone one的主题也是应此而生。

游戏的简介虽说主题是亡国公主的归家之旅，但事实上游戏的立意和格局可能更为高远——这是没玩fault 2的我的一种臆测。单纯把fault 1作为一个独立的游戏来讲，这可能会与想象中的遇到各种各样突发事件与人物的艰辛的旅程这一印象有些偏差，它的物理移动范围在这里是有限的，“扎根”在这个与女主人公们相性不合之地。

作为一个使用魔法维持社会秩序与运作的的架空世界，故事的舞台却是一个低魔区域，一个更偏向于现实社会的区域。在那里，科学技术是第一生产力，枝繁叶茂的科技树可能已经盖住了现实的光辉，甚至树枝已经伸展到卡巴拉之树Yesod之处——灵魂与记忆的转移。稍微有些经验的玩家可能多多少少都有过与Robotess（女机器人）共处一段时光的体验，她们随着作者的安排，亦温柔令人隽永感动、亦冷漠贯彻机械本质等等。对于机器人这种可自我认知的““自在的存在”，大概是渗透哲学性信息较好利用的手段。而本作中关于灵魂的探讨则是在自有独特的魔法世界观之上建立的，这便是milestone one的看点所在。

说到这里倒是首先要为剧透敏感者道个歉，如果你真的读完了上面这段文字的话。从游戏里能找到现实的影子，说明制作者的立意并没有太拘泥于小团体上的亲情、友情描述，他有着更高远而浅的主题。这些都无可厚非，但是如果放在了亡国归家之旅的一开始，便有些突兀了。

首先，对于从公主与莉特娜逃离王国到很…很远的地方到第一段故事开始的这段进展描写是隶属于大格局的，对于后面的故事发展其实并无多用，这容易让(人)我产生进展急躁的“错觉”。后续的故事发展就如上所说，本身质量好不错，但是叙事手段却显得有些笨拙了，阶段与阶段之间的联系很垂直，如果是直叙那么后面这一部分都是直叙，如果是倒叙的话后面又是长长的一段脱离公主与莉特娜本身主题的故事……如此从整体来看不免有些失衡，如果能在前面与露恩相处的时间里透露出更多信息并追加倒叙，混排设定，这样既能平衡戏份、又能增加悬念，而不是只靠干瘪的单一线索和伏笔来掀开后续的剧情帷幕。

说到底这也只是我的一厢之愿，故事的质量在众多独立VN中依然很是出众，值得一玩。角色的设定是很会给自己挖坑那种——事实上这作中公主与莉特娜的戏份太少了，在两个人没有透露更多世界观信息时就进入到了“正文”，有些让人生疑。而在这段故事美好的结局之后，文本并没有做一些明显的角色间总结性交流与下一段故事的情感修正，而是直接拉开了fault 2的悬念（与上一段故事的设定补完）！这直接导致后登台的角色小露恩的冷场尴尬（因为设定未补全、对话跟不上）。

再有一些类似“BUG”的地方便是BGM的诡异。首先是长时间的BGM静音，一般这种情况大多会用于真实安静的环境或者以突出某段对话，但是长时间的中断静BGM并且过了很多对话，明显打乱了这种节奏。还有一些地方BGM直接与对话气氛不相符，比如后面HE那一部分，明明大家很欢快为什么要用那么严肃紧张的音乐……

CG的话可能由于美术资源原因吧（姑且这么告诉自己），首先是大家都提到的一些男性角色的立绘有些粗糙啦，我倒是无所谓。但是在一些CG中却没有较为明显地画出时间跨度下角色的年龄沧桑感，emmm…好像没有林志颖这一定设定，所以看起来有点出戏…

要评价milestone one的地位高低不游玩后续作品还是比较难的，即使是不脱离亲情、友情的大主题，而是对另一些事物于此世界观下的探讨的话，这部作品可能只说得上是一部不错的外传、尴尬的序章。

虽然怼了不少地方，但本作这个体量上的独立VN有这样的成果还是很难得的，在sekai project的发行帮助下还跨上了主机平台，并有衍生漫画，IP大有可塑，可喜可贺、可喜可贺<3 <3。

文字写于[url=https://cowlevel.net/game/fault_milestone_one/review/2541430]奶牛关游戏社区[/url]，也发表在了我那个没人看的[url=https://design.moe/2017/07/06/feel-fault-milestone-one/]Blog[/url]上。

33173605.review:
This is the first in a series of visual novels that is seemingly about two characters that have been magically whisked away to a strange new land, their attempts to return home, and the adventures they have along the way.

While that seems to be the overarching plot of the series, this novel in particular is much more focused on exploring a few different themes by really digging deep into handful of different characters and their relationships with each other. I really can't say too much more here, because I strongly believe that the best way to experience these kinds of stories is by going into them knowing as little as possible so you can be surprised by what follows. What I will say is that the characters are well written and are given time and attention to flourish. Having interesting, well written, and sympathetic characters is this novel's greatest strength.

Unfortunately, the novel starts kind of sluggishly, and the worldbuilding is handled a bit clumsily. There is a lot of attention to detail about how the magic in this world works, and not all of it is introduced in an interesting way. It's certainly nice that the writers put effort into having the world make sense, but a lot of it just doesn't seem particularly interesting, or even relevant to the plot.

If you can get past that, though, there are some great moments in this novel, and it is well worth the price. I am already looking forward to reading through the next installment in the series.

游戏总评：
剧情：推荐，没有机关算尽，没有爱恨情仇。
只是一个不寻常的家庭里发生的更加不寻常的悲剧（剧透）[spoiler]在亲人无尽的爱下被拯救[/spoiler]的故事。

时间：大概在3小时左右

优点：
所有地方都能看到的满满的诚意
还可以的演出+还算优秀的音乐
无语音（是的，优点）
不够精致却诚意满满的CG，在这样长度里却刻画的已经不错的主角们。

缺点：
大量没足够精力或足够能力或金钱来打磨的细节
回放内容只能返回（我最后几个字没看清都被迫返回了，虽然从返回看表情这方面来说倒是不错）
BGM不够多，所以不少地方BGM和背景不够搭，还有[strike]只有一章太短23333[/strike]，选项只有几句话的区别……（我还删了再下回来再选另一个………………）。

通关前写的：
怎么说呢？我是买的2，然后玩了个开局，被哪[strike]粗犷[/strike]的bgm吓到，被那个开局演出[strike]震了下[/strike]，然后就来玩1了
怎么说呢？能感受到世界观的庞大，BGM挺棒的，[spoiler]就是不知道是不是错觉，爆炸声、震惊声效等好像经常破音？[/spoiler]角色塑造的不错，汉化也很棒，CG感觉挺英气。虽然只玩了个开头，不过还是挺期待的（显示的时间至少有4个多小时是挂卡）

不过不知道为什么，总觉得有点怪怪的……论演出和音乐，应该都无法和魔法使之夜媲美，但是迷之带感……不过总觉得很多地方处理的挺粗糙的，这种粗糙不要说和魔法使之夜的细腻比，连一般的gal都不如，但是立绘、演出都已经挺不错了啊……为什么总感觉有什么地方处理的很粗糙呢？奇怪了………………果然还是前面提到的[spoiler]迷之破音[/spoiler]么？

总体感觉还不错，14买了也没什么亏的

33101912.review:
I don't know why, but the second I opened fault, I knew I'd love it. A lot. To the point I may be in love with it - and I don't think I'm exaggerating there.
The first one in a promising series ; no (real) choices, all text. Many people would be thrown off for not having any choices, but, regardless of the lack of action on our part, there's still action in the narration.
It's easy to read, and really immersive, especially with the music. The events (No spoilers) aren't predictable - at least not much, only a few details.
The only problem with this part is that the way it ended was a bit abrupt ; not the second it ended and that you come back to the title screen, but the way the plot ended there. Then again, it's only the first one - and, if I remember well, there were a few problems concerning the making of it.

So, honestly, my opinion ? I recommend it. It's the beginning of a long and, as I said, promising journey.
